1a1('dul ba): (tha) @#/ ! /'dul ba lung bzhugs so/ /
1a2('dul ba): (黃) 律師戒行經第十部
1b1('dul ba): @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ bi na ya k+Shu dra ka bstu/ bod skad du/ 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/
1b2('dul ba): bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phran tshegs kyi gzhi'i sdom ni/
1b3('dul ba): so phag chan pa chos gos dang / /shing tshad dang ni gnas brtan lus/ /rgyus pa 'gyod pa dbyung ba nyid/ /phran
1b4('dul ba): tshegs gzhir ni yang dag bshad/ / bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ so phag sen mo bcos pa dang / /lhung
1b5('dul ba): bzed yan lag me long skyes/ /lam phran chu tshags mon sran sde'u/ /rkang pa bkru dang gos mdud do/ / sdom
1b6('dul ba): ni so phag dang ni sa dkar dang / /nya phyis dri yi lag ris dang / /ka ba dang ni skud pa gnyis/ /lag
1b7('dul ba): rgyan dang ni sor gdub rgya/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs
1b8('dul ba): pa na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te yangs
2a1('dul ba): pa can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / yangs pa can gyi bar dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i bar gyi bar skabs de na yangs pa can gyi lid tsha bi rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum
2a2('dul ba): tshogs pa/ bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa dga' ba'i tshal dang 'dra ba de dag na de dag gi rtse ba dang / gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs dag dang / khrus kyi yo byad sna tshogs dag kyang bzhag pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/
2a3('dul ba): dga' bo nye dga' bo/ yangs pa can gyi lid tsha bi 'di dag dang / bskyed mos tshal gyi dga' ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dper mdzad na/ re shig de dag gi bskyed mos tshal ci 'dra ba blta'o zhes
2a4('dul ba): de rnams glod nas de dag gi bskyed mos tshal du zhugs so/ /de dag gis de na brtsal ba'i yo byad mda' bo che dang drang ba dang / 'phang rdo sna tshogs dang / gar dang glu dang / rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs dang / pi bang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang /
2a5('dul ba): khar rnga dang / skad snyan la sogs pa sna tshogs dang / khrus kyi yo byad so phag dang / bkru ba'i phye ma dang / mgo bkru ba skyu ru ra sna tshogs mthong ba dang / de rnams kyis phan tshun smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo yo byad phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa
2a6('dul ba): du ma 'di dag yod na/ ci re shig brtsal bya 'am/ 'on te gar bya 'am/ glu blang ngam/ rol mo'i sgra bya 'am/ khrus bya/ kha cig gis smras pa bdag cag bkrus nas ring zhig lon gyis/ je khrus bya'o zhes de dag glod nas so phag dag gis
2a7('dul ba): drud cing drud nas khrus bya bar brtsams pa dang / bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas de dag la mkhas pas khrus la zhugs pa de rnams kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba 'di lta ste/ sil snyan yan lag lnga pa skyes bu mkhas pas legs par dkrol ba'i
2a8('dul ba): lta bu byung ngo / /skye bo'i tshogs phal po che lam de nas 'gro bas sgra de thos pa dang / de rnams rna byo ste/ yud tsam bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag yangs pa can gyi lid tsha bi rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal na gar mkhan rnams gar byed pa
2b1('dul ba): ltar 'dong ngam/ de ltar bya'o zhes ltad mo la yid 'dun pa de dag myur bar chas te bskyed mos tshal du dong nas de dag nang du zhugs pa dang / drug sde rnams kyang phyir byung ngo / /de dag gis de rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag phyogs gang na
2b2('dul ba): gar mkhan rnams gar bgyid/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyod kyis bye brag mi phyed de/ gar mkhan gar byed pa la sgra 'di lta bu 'byung ngam/ 'phags pa dag 'o na 'di su'i sgra lags/ shes ldan dag kho bo cag lus drud nas khrus
2b3('dul ba): byas pa yin no/ /'phags pa dag ci dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir tam/ bkren pa khyed kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan la dge sbyong kho bo cag 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir to/ /khyed kho bo cag gi rjes su ston pa yin nam
2b4('dul ba): ci/ ma smra bar deng / khyed la gnod pa byas sa re zhes de rnams kyis de dag bsdigs pa dang / spa gong nas dong ste/ yangs pa can du zhugs nas lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu 'phya bar brtsams so/ /dge slong
2b5('dul ba): rnams kyis skabs de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams so phag dag gis lus drud de khrus byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge
2b6('dul ba): slong gis so phag gis lus drud de khrus mi bya'o/ /'drud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud de khrus mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag rkang pa ser ga byung
2b7('dul ba): zhing dri ma dang bcas bzhin bsod snyoms la 'jug pa de dag bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed zhabs ser ga byung zhing dri ma dang bcas na/ ci ste dri ma sbyang bar mi bgyi/ de rnams kyis smras
2b8('dul ba): pa/ bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /ci 'phags pa khyed dri ma'i 'dam bcangs pas dag par 'gyur ram/ de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ bsod snyoms la brgyus nas gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang / skabs de
3a1('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar na snga ma ni bcas pa'o/ /'di ni gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na dge slong gis rkang pa
3a2('dul ba): so phag gis drud par gnang ngo / /lus gzhan ni ma yin te/ 'drud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs dang
3a3('dul ba): chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de rnams kyis bram ze zhig sa dkar gyis so ris gsum byugs nas slongs mo la rgyu zhing de'i bslangs pa yang mang du rnyed par
3a4('dul ba): mthong ngo / /drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang de ltar bya'o zhes de rnams phyi de nyin sa dkar gyis so ris gsum byugs nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma dad pa rnams kyis
3a5('dul ba): mthong nas 'phya zhing gus par smra'o/ /gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis
3a6('dul ba): smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed kyi phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag
3a7('dul ba): bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so/ /de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /skabs de dge slong rnams
3a8('dul ba): kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams so ris gsum 'dri ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis so ris gsum
3b1('dul ba): bri bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong so ris gsum 'dri na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so ris gsum mi byug go zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag sman pas bsgo yang lus sas mi skud pa'i skabs
3b2('dul ba): de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar na snga ma ni bcas pa'o/ /'di ni gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs so/ /sangs
3b3('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms
3b4('dul ba): kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de rnams kyis bram ze 'gi'u wang gi thig le byas pa zhig skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis bskor zhing ston mo'i bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ba dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni
3b5('dul ba): bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang 'di ltar bya'o/ /legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de rnams phyi de nyin 'gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa byas nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dag
3b6('dul ba): gis mthong nas 'phya zhing gus par smra'o gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyod kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/
3b7('dul ba): de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed kyi phyag ma yin/
3b8('dul ba): 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so/ /de'i slad du bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis/ bzod par gsol lo/ /zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /skabs de
4a1('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong dag 'gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa
4a2('dul ba): las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis 'gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis brgyan par mi bya'o/ /brgyan na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis 'gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag
4a3('dul ba): nyid brgyan par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong zhig dpral bar rma byung ba de sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin bzangs bdag la sman ston cig /'phags pa rma'i than kor 'gi'u wang gis skus shig dang khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur
4a4('dul ba): ro/ /des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
4a5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong dag sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams nya phyis kyis
4a6('dul ba): 'drud par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nya phyis kyis drud par mi bya'o/ /'drud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
4a7('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams dris byugs te gzhon nu rnams kyi nang du dong nas smras pa/ gzhon nu dag nged kyi dri ji lta snoms shig /de dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan ci
4a8('dul ba): khyed dris byugs sam/ byugs so/ /gnas brtan khyed dris byug tu rung ngam/ rung yang rung mi rung yang rung ste/ nged kyis ni byugs so/ /de dag 'phya smod kha zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
4b1('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dris nyug pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyi dris byug par mi bya'o/ /nyug na 'gal tshabs
4b2('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dris byug par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pa zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs bdag la sman ston cig /des smras pa/
4b3('dul ba): 'phags pa dris byugs na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhin bzangs ci kho bo 'dod pa spyod dam/ 'phags pa khyod kyi sman ni 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni 'tsho bar mi nus so/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
4b4('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis sman pa'i lung gis dri bcang bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag dris byugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug cing bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams
4b5('dul ba): la chos ston par byed/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su yang 'gro bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dge slong dri 'chang ba'i kun du spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya
4b6('dul ba): ste/ dge slong dri 'chang bas dris byugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug par mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i/ nam sos par gyur pa de'i tshe khrus
4b7('dul ba): byas nas dri med par gyur pa dang dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug par bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o/ /dge slong dri 'chang bas kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar
4b8('dul ba): bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la dri 'bul ba na/ dge slong rnams 'gyod nas mi len pa dang de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
5a1('dul ba): 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe ni mu stegs can rnams yon gnas lags/ da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bas da ltar khyed yon gnas lags na/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag
5a2('dul ba): cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du dge ba'i lam rgyags ma mchis par mchi 'am/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad tu bzhes shig /de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
5a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis rin thang bzhin
5a4('dul ba): du nyo nyo na khyed kyis blangs te dor ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blangs nas dor bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la dri'i
5a5('dul ba): lag ris byug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la dri'i lag ris nyug go/ /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci bdag cag gis mchod rten ma mthong ngam/ bdag
5a6('dul ba): cag gis ni khyed kho na la phul te/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la ni sngar phul lags so/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blangs nas gnas
5a7('dul ba): khang la byug par bya'o/ /de rnams kyis gnas khang gi sgo la byugs pa dang / de dag dri gtsang khang yin no snyam nas phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
5a8('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang du byug par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis drang thad du byugs pa dang / nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngas dang nye ba 'am rkang pa dang nye bar byug par bya zhing
5b1('dul ba): dri zhim po thams cad mig la phan pas dus dus su bsnam par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs 'jigs lta'i tshal ri dgas kyi nags na bzhugs so/ /ji tsam na
5b2('dul ba): rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs byed kyi khang bzangs pad ma ris byed du bcug nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs te/ bcom ldan 'das khang bzangs pad ma'i ris su dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung
5b3('dul ba): la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /nye dga' bo zan za ba'i tshe lag pas ka ba la bsnun pa dang / khang bzang pad ma ris g.yos par gyur to/ /'dri mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rgyal bu rtogs byed kyis
5b4('dul ba): khang bzangs pad ma ris tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bkra bar byas pa khyed kyis gzhig gam ci/ nye dga' bos smras pa/ bkren pa rtogs byed 'di la lhag par chags pas dus byas nas gar skye gtol med do/ /khyed kyang 'di la lhag
5b5('dul ba): par chags pas dus byas nas yi dags lba ba can rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag kha zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang
5b6('dul ba): cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag ka ba la lag pas bsnun pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lag pas ka ba la bsnun par mi bya'o/ /snun na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ka ba la lag
5b7('dul ba): pas bsnun par mi bya zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams khu tshur dang gru mo dang / phrag pa dang mgo dang / rtsib logs dang / rgyab dang / rked pa dang / brla dang / pus mo dang / byin pa dang / rkang pa dang / dbyug pa dang / bong ba dang / gzhan gyis
5b8('dul ba): snun par byed pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis kyang bsnun par mi bya'o/ /drug sde rnams rtsig pa dang sa dang / gzhan la snun par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
6a1('dul ba): gzhan la yang gang gis kyang bsnun par mi bya'o/ /bsnun na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
6a2('dul ba): drug sde rnams snga dro mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de rnams kyis bram ze zhig tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs te slongs mo la rgyu zhing des bza' ba dang bca' ba yang mang du rnyed pa mthong nas drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ 'ga'
6a3('dul ba): bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang de lta bu bya'o zhes de dag phyi de nyin tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs te/ bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma dad pa rnams kyis mthong nas/ 'phya zhing gus par smra'o/ /gus par
6a4('dul ba): smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram
6a5('dul ba): ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal
6a6('dul ba): gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so/ /de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
6a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis tshangs pa'i skud pa gdags par mi bya'o/ /'dogs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
6a8('dul ba): ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod
6b1('dul ba): snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de dag gis bram ze dri dang me tog gis brgyan pa tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings pa zhig dus ston zos nas dbang po tshim ste/ khyim nas byung ba mthong ba dang / de dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye
6b2('dul ba): dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang 'di bzhin bya'o zhes de dag phyi de nyin tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya zhing
6b3('dul ba): gus par smra'o/ /gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci
6b4('dul ba): zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed
6b5('dul ba): bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/ dge slong du ni ma lags so/ /de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas
6b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa 'ching ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis tshon sna lnga pa'i
6b7('dul ba): skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o/ /'ching na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pa gzhan zhig sman pa'i
6b8('dul ba): drung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs kho bo la nad 'di lta bu byung na sman ston cig ces byas pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa skud pa la gsang sngags dag gis bzlas brjod byas te/ lag pa la bcings na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/
7a1('dul ba): bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
7a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis sman pa'i lung gis skud pa bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i lung gis skud pa bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste/ nyes
7a3('dul ba): dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'o/ /de rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/
7a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar mi bya'o/ /de rnams lag pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa g.yon
7a5('dul ba): pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams nad sos par gyur nas skud pa bab bab tu 'dor bas mi ma yin pa rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa dag nged kyis sos par
7a6('dul ba): byas na da ma gus par byed pa lta/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bab bab tu dor bar mi bya ste/ gal te nad ma byang na chos gos kyi mtha' 'am/ rgya cang
7a7('dul ba): la bcing bar bya'o/ /'on te thams cad kyi thams cad du sos par gyur na ka ba'i ser ga 'am/ rtsig pa'i gseb tu gzhug par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
7a8('dul ba): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis rgyan slob ma'i nang du
7b1('dul ba): bzhag pa drug sde rnams kyis rkang rgyan dang lag rgyan dag thogs nas smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo ji lta mdzes sam/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed mgo ni byi/ mchan khung ni spun na 'di la lus mdzes pa ci
7b2('dul ba): zhig yod gdon mi za bar dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir bar gyur to zhes byas pa dang / de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
7b3('dul ba): kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams lag rgyan dang rkang rgyan dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lag brgyan dang rkang rgyan gyis bdag nyid brgyan par mi bya'o/ /brgyan na 'gal
7b4('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gtsug lag khang du ma byin par len pa rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi mdzod dang / gang zag gi
7b5('dul ba): gnas khang dag nas brkus so/ /dge slong gzhan dag gcig gi yang stor na/ bdag cag gi stor nas ji tsam lon pa ma tshor ro/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
7b6('dul ba): de lta bas na gnang gis rgya bcang bar bya'o bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang shel las byas pa dang / sor gdub rgya rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag
7b7('dul ba): bcangs so/ /de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas lag pa brgyang ste smras pa/ bzhin bzangs nad med cig nad med cig /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di ci lags/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya gnang ngo
7b8('dul ba): de dag 'phya smod kha zer zhing dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyis dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ 'di na da ltar rgya la tha snyad 'dogs shing rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byed do/ /skabs de dge slong
8a1('dul ba): rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa'i rgya bcang bar mi bya/ sor gdub rgya yang bcang bar mi
8a2('dul ba): bya'i 'on kyang rgya lnga po ra gan dang / zangs las byas pa dang / khar ba las byas pa dang / ba so las byas pa dang / rwa las byas pa bcang bar bya'o/ /drug sde rnams kyis rgya la skyes pa dang / bud med nyal po byed pa bris pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis
8a3('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyod 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir tam/ gnas skabs de dge slong rnams gyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgya ni gnyis te/ dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag gi'o/ /
8a4('dul ba): de la dge 'dun gyi ni dbus su 'khor lo bris la/ glo gnyis su ri dgas 'og tu gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i ming bri bar bya'o/ /gang zag gi ni rus pa'i keng rus sam/ mgo'i thod pa bri bar bya'o/ / sdom ni/ sen mo 'breg dang byi dor dang / /a mra dang
8a5('dul ba): ni skyu ru ra/ /lhung bzed brgyad po bkag pa dang / /rjes su gnang ba gnyis yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
8a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe/ des 'breg mkhan gyi mi la smras pa/ kye skyes bu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu bregs shig /de rgyal
8a7('dul ba): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stongs pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na 'chag cing 'dug pa des de
8a8('dul ba): rgyang ring po nas mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /khyod zla ba lta bur gnas na ring mo zhig lon te/ gang nas 'ongs/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyim bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi
8b1('dul ba): skra dang kha spu breg pa'i slad du 'dir btang ngo / /des smras pa/ sen mo legs par 'breg shes sam/ 'phags pa 'di nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/ /bltas tshur de nye bar 'ongs pa dang / nye dga' bos lag pa brkyang ngo / /'breg mkhan gyis
8b2('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa ci 'dra bar breg /bzhin bzangs 'bru'i rtse mo ltar bregs shig /des 'bru'i rtse mo ltar bregs pa dang / des smras pa/ da ni ra ba'i cog lta bu dang / spu gri'i so dang / ste'u ka dang / zla ba tshes pa ltar gyis shig /des de ji lta/ ji ltar sgo ba
8b3('dul ba): de lta bur byas pa dang / mjug tu smras pa/ bkren pa khyod ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig /'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song shig ces des de nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang ngo / /de nyi ma nub nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du song ba dang /
8b4('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis 'phags pa mang po ji snyed cig gi mgo dang kha spu bregs/ bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu ga la bregs/ dge sbyong gzu lums can nye dga' bos bdag bsgor nas/ sen mo
8b5('dul ba): 'bru'i rtse mo dang / ra ba'i cog dang / spu gri'i so dang / ste'u ka dang / zla ba tshes pa lta bur gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag gis bgyis pa dang / de nas 'di skad ces/ bkren pa khyod ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig /'di kho na ltar mnyam
8b6('dul ba): par gyis la song shig ces mchi nas da gzod kho na shor na ci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba rnams la nye bar zhi ba med pa lta zhes 'phya ba la zhugs so/ /skabs de dge slong
8b7('dul ba): rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams sen mo 'breg pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sen mo breg par mi bya'o/ /'breg
8b8('dul ba): na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams sen mo ring po ring por 'dug pa bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci
9a1('dul ba): ste sen mo ring po ring por 'jog / bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa ci khyod sen mo bcangs pas 'dag par 'gyur ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
9a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snga ma ni bcas pa'o/ /'di ni gnang ba yin te de lta bas na gnang gis sen mo rnam pa gnyis po spu gri'i so dang / ste'u ka lta bur breg par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
9a3('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhes bya ba thams cad de kho na bzhin no/ /khyod sen mo 'chos shes sam/ 'phags
9a4('dul ba): pa ji lta bur bgyi/ ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag gis bgyis pa dang / de nas 'di skad ces bkren pa khyed ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig /'di kho na ltar
9a5('dul ba): mnyam par gyis la song shig ces mchi nas da gzod kho na shor na ci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba rnams la nye bar zhi ba med pa lta zhes 'phya ba la zhugs so/ /skabs
9a6('dul ba): de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams sen mo dag byi dor byed pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sen mo
9a7('dul ba): dag byi dor mi bya'o/ /byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo dag byi dor mi bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong tshon rtsi'i las dang / lhung bzed kyi las byed pa rnams kyi sen mo dri ma
9a8('dul ba): chags la mdog mi sdug par gyur cing / de rnams sen mo de 'dra ba kho nar bsod snyoms la 'jug go/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed ci'i phyir sen mo de lta bur dri ma chags
9b1('dul ba): shing mdog mi sdug / de dag gis bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci'i phyir dri ma mi dbyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa khyed ci dri ma'i 'dam bcangs pas 'dag par 'gyur ram/ skabs de dge slong
9b2('dul ba): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri ma dbyid pa'i phyir sen mo bzhar bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na
9b3('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i kun du spyod pa ni dus kyi gsar thog 'bru sar pa 'am 'bras bu sar pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag dang por dge 'dun la 'bul lo/ /de'i 'og tu bdag nyid za'o/ /de'i blon po rnams
9b4('dul ba): kyis a mra'i shing thog dag phul ba dang / des smras pa/ song la 'phags pa rnams la phul cig /de dag gis rgad pa dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci la rgod/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha ci khyod da ni 'phags pa rnams la dang por
9b5('dul ba): 'bul snyam dgongs kyi/ bdag cag gis ches sngar 'phags pa rnams la phul bar ni ma lags sam/ des smras pa/ gal te de lta na ngas 'phags pa rnams la stong gi kun dga' ra ba nyid phul lo/ /lha legs te rjes su yi rang ngo / /des
9b6('dul ba): phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stong gi kun dga' ra ba phul nas der dus ston kyang btsugs so/ /de ji ltar yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dus ston la lta bar 'ongs pa a mra'i shing thog smin pa rnams kyis tshim
9b7('dul ba): par gyur pa de ltar shing thog rgyas par gyur to/ /de dge 'dun la phul zhes dge slong rnams kyis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du zos so/ /ji tsam na mtshams kyi rgyal po zhig la a mra dag dgos par gyur nas/ des rgyal po
9b8('dul ba): gzugs can snying po la pho nya btang ste/ grogs po bdag la a mra dag dgos kyis bskur ba'i rigs so zhes byas pa dang / des pho nya de la smras pa/ kye skyes bu ngas stong gi kun dga' ra ba de 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul gyis song la
10a1('dul ba): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la slongs shig / de 'od ma'i tshal du song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyis kun du spyod pa ni rtag tu kun dga' ra ba'i sgo mi stongs par byed pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo 'od ma'i tshal gyi sgo na
10a2('dul ba): 'chag cing 'dug go/ /de de'i drung du song nas phyag 'tshal te des smras pa/ rgyal po che ge mo zhig gis a mra'i ched du khyed kyi thad tu btang na de'i slad tu a mra dag stsal ba'i rigs so/ /des smras pa/ kye skyes bu song la a mra ji tsam
10a3('dul ba): dgos pa de tsam long shig / de song nas a mra'i shing rnams kyi drung du bltas na mi snang ste/ de slar log nas smras pa/ 'phags pa ma mchis so/ /nye dga' bos de khrid nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs te/ kun dga'i
10a4('dul ba): ra ba thams cad bskor nas smras pa/ kye skyes bu shing 'di la 'dzegs shig /des 'dzegs nas ma mthong ba dang / nye dga' bos smras pa/ kye skyes bu dag shar gyi yal gar song lho dang nub kyi yal gar song / de thams cad du song nas skyo bar gyur te babs
10a5('dul ba): nas smras pa/ 'phags pa ci kun dga'i ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam/ bzhin bzangs ji ltar lo re zhing lo re zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags so/ /'phags pa ci rlung dang char pas blags sam/ bzhin bzangs
10a6('dul ba): rlung dang char pas ma blags kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so/ /de slar log nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol pa/ lha 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal nas kho bo cag gis a mra'i
10a7('dul ba): 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so zhes gsung ngo / /des smras pa/ legs te nga la longs spyad pa nyid dgos so zhes byas pa dang / mi de slar song ngo / /ji tsam na dus ston la bab pa'i tshe yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs
10a8('dul ba): 'dus nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci stong gi kun dga' ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam/ bzhin bzangs dag ji ltar lo re lo re zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo cag
10b1('dul ba): gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so/ /'phags pa dag gang yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad a mra smin pa dag gis tshim par 'gyur ba de khyed kyis 'bras bu ma smin pa kho nar 'chos te/ gang kho bo
10b2('dul ba): cag la gnod pa byas pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /des smras pa/ 'di rgyal pos yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la byin pa ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul te/ de lta bas na kho bo cag gis ji ltar 'dod pa
10b3('dul ba): bzhin zos so/ /khyed ci gtogs zhes byas pa dang / de dag 'phya smod kha zer bar byed do/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad
10b4('dul ba): ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams a mra dag za ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis a mra dag bza' bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong a mra dag za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis a mra dag bza' bar
10b5('dul ba): mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la shing sa ha ka ra'i shing tog dag 'bul ba na/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /de dag gis smras pa/
10b6('dul ba): 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro 'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /skabs de/ dge slong
10b7('dul ba): rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis mtshan nyid grub pa yin no zhes byas nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /de la mtshan
10b8('dul ba): nyid grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/ tshig gu chags pa rnams so/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can gzhan dag cig /dge slong rnams la a mra'i shing thog smin pa dag 'bul ba na zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin du 'jig rten 'di
11a1('dul ba): nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi 'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar thams cad snga ma bzhin no/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na
11a2('dul ba): gnang gis mtshan nyid bye brag phyed do zhes byas te bza' bar bya'o/ /de la mtshan nyid bye brag phyed pa ni 'di dag yin te/ sha zhugs pa rnams so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
11a3('dul ba): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong nad pa zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs bdag 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs na sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags pa je mar 'thung la snum par gyis shig
11a4('dul ba): dang bkru sman sbyin no/ /des mar 'thungs pa dang / skom pas gnod par gyur to/ /sman pa 'ongs te dris pa/ 'phags pa bde bar 'dug gam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bdag skom pas gnod do/ /skyu ru ra chongs shig
11a5('dul ba): ces byas pa dang / des lag tu blangs te 'dug go/ /yang sman pas dris pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ma bral lo/ /sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru ra ma bcangs sam/
11a6('dul ba): bzhin bzangs yod de 'di yin no/ /'phags pa khar chongs shig /bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de zhes bya ba nas/ bcom
11a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khar bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /des khar bcug nas 'dug go/ /yang sman pa de 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs da rung
11a8('dul ba): ma bral lo/ /sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru ra khar ma bcangs sam/ bzhin bzangs bcangs te 'dug pa 'di yin no/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa mur cig /gzhan du na skoms pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur
11b1('dul ba): ro/ /des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
11b2('dul ba): stsal pa/ mur bar bya'o/ /mur mur nas bor gyi ma mid pa dang / skom pas je gnod par gyur to/ /yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs shin du gnod do/ /'phags pa
11b3('dul ba): de'i tshe skyu ru ra ma mur ram/ bzhin bzangs mur nas bor ro/ /'phags pa ci'i phyir ma mid/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas bkag go/ /'phags pa khyod ni nad pa yin la/ khyod kyi ston pa
11b4('dul ba): ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong dag gnang gis 'bras bu lnga dus su yang rung /
11b5('dul ba): dus ma yin par yang rung / nad pa yang rung / mi na bas kyang rung bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu lnga dus su yang rung / dus ma yin par yang rung / nad pa yang rung / mi na bas kyang
11b6('dul ba): rung ste/ bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu lnga gang dag yin pa mi shes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyu ru ra dang / a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / pi pi ling dang / na le
11b7('dul ba): sham mo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag shin du bzang po zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod
11b8('dul ba): chen po zhig gnas pa de gcer bu pa rnams la rab tu dad do/ /des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/
12a1('dul ba): dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos mnabs lhung bzed bsnams te/ rgyal po'i khab tu
12a2('dul ba): bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing khyim bdag shin du bzang po'i khyim ga la ba de logs su gshegs pa dang / khyim bdag shin du bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rgyang ma nas
12a3('dul ba): mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang chung ma khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchis brang 'di sems can zhugs par
12a4('dul ba): gyur na ci zhig tu btsa' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan
12a5('dul ba): pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /des bcom ldan 'das la bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul ba dang /
12a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis nad med cig ces gsungs nas bsod snyoms bzhes te gshegs so/ /de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na gcer bu pa zhig 'dug pa des bsams pa/ gang bdag cag la bslang ba'i khyim gcig
12a7('dul ba): pu zhig yod pa de yang dge sbyong gau ta mas kha drangs kyis song la dge sbyong gau ta mas ci lung bstan pa blta'o snyam mo/ /de der song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'ongs par gyur tam/ byon to/ /des ci zhig
12a8('dul ba): lung bstan/ 'phags pa bdag gis de la chung ma bstan te/ ci zhig tu btsa' bar 'gyur zhes bgyis pa dang / de bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams
12b1('dul ba): su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo / /gcer bu pa de rtsis mkhas pa zhig ste/ rdo rgyus kha dog dkar po blangs
12b2('dul ba): nas brtsis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du lung bstan pa de thams cad de kho na bzhin du mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ gal te rjes su bsngags na ni khyim bdag 'di dge sbyong gau ta ma la dad par 'ong bas de bas na 'dir
12b3('dul ba): cung zad cig ni bsngags par bya/ cung zad cig ni smad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ lag pa dkyog bzhin bsgyur ba dang / khyim bdag shin du bzang pos smras pa/ 'phags pa ci ste lag pa dkyog bzhin bsgyur/ des
12b4('dul ba): smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di la cung zad cig ni bden/ cung zad cig ni brdzun no/ /'phags pa gang ni bden gang ni brdzun/ khyim bdag bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni bden no/ /rigs gsal
12b5('dul ba): bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni bden na/ gsal ba ni me'i ming yin pas sems can skal ba chung ngu de btsas ma thag kho nar khyim mes tshig par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /
12b6('dul ba): zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni brdzun te/ khyim bdag khyod kyis mir gyur pa la lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar gyur pa 'ga' yod pa lta mthong ngam/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes zer ba de bden te/ gang
12b7('dul ba): gi tshe 'di bza' ba yang med/ bgo ba yang med pa de'i tshe gdon mi za bar dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thad du rab tu byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par
12b8('dul ba): 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni brdzun te/ re shig dge sbyong gau ta ma la yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid med na/ de'i nyan thos la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khyim bdag shin du bzang po
13a1('dul ba): mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ gcer bu pas smras pa/ khyim bdag bdag cag ni rab tu byung ba ste/ bslab pa blangs pa yin pas khyod nyid shes
13a2('dul ba): so zhes smras nas song ngo / /shin du bzang pos bsams pa 'di yang dor ro snyam nas sman ma yin pa sbyin par brtsams pa dang / sems can de srid pa tha ma pa zhig pas sman ma yin pa de yang de la sman du gyur to/ /des de'i
13a3('dul ba): dku g.yon pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang / mngal na 'dug pa de dku g.yas par song ngo / /shin du bzang pos dku g.yas pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang / de dku g.yon par song ste/ srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can
13a4('dul ba): zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du bar ma dor rgyun chad cing dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do/ /khyim bdag shin du bzang po'i chung ma de dku mnyes pas ngu bar brtsams pa dang / khyim
13a5('dul ba): tshes dag gis thos nas rings pa rings par song ste dris pa/ shes ldan khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di ci ste ngu / shin du bzang pos smras pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di bu btsa' ba'i dus la bab bo zhes byas pa dang / de
13a6('dul ba): de dag dong ngo / /shin du bzang pos bsams pa/ bdag gis 'di 'dir gsad mi nus kyis dgon par bkri'o/ /snyam nas des de dgon par khrid nas ci nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar brtsal nas des de sbas te
13a7('dul ba): khyim du khyer nas mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / phu nu dang / khyim tshes rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i chung ma shi'o/ /de dag gis ngu bar brtsams nas de dag ngu zhing de gos sngon po dang / ser po dang /
13a8('dul ba): dmar po dang / dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan nas bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod tu khyer ro/ /gcer bu pa dag gis thos nas de dag dga' mgu rangs nas gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag bsgreng ste
13b1('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab grong khyer gyi lam po che dang / srang dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu rgyu zhing smras pa/ shes ldan dag nyon cig /dge sbyong gau ta mas khyim bdag shin du bzang po'i chung ma bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs
13b2('dul ba): gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de ni shi nas
13b3('dul ba): bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod tu khyer ro/ /re shig shing gang la rtsa ba nyid kyang med pa de la yal ga dang 'dab ma dang / lo ma 'byung bar lta ga la 'gyur/ skabs 'di lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen pa
13b4('dul ba): 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rig pa 'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pu/ gcig
13b5('dul ba): tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis gnas pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu
13b6('dul ba): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil la legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms par mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi snyengs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba
13b7('dul ba): lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ drug la rtag tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa
13b8('dul ba): ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' ba/ grags pas phyogs bcur khyab pa/ stong la dbang sgyur ba bas khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis
14a1('dul ba): nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs shing su ni nyams/ su ni dar su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni skobs su chud par gyur/ su ni gnod par gyur/ su ni nyam nga ba dang
14a2('dul ba): skobs su chud pa dang / gnod par gyur/ su ni ngan song la gzhol/ su ni ngan song la bab/ su ni ngan song la 'bab/ gang ni ngan song las drangs nas mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la dgod/ gang zhig gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa ni
14a3('dul ba): bskyed par bya/ gang zhig gis bskyed pa ni yongs su smin par bya/ gang zhig smin pa ni grol bar bya zhes ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /yang smras pa/ chu srin gnas kyi rgya mtsho ni/ /dus rlabs 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/ /gdul
14a4('dul ba): bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las mi 'da'o/ /ji ltar ma ni sdug pa'i bu gcig la/ /lta zhing de yi srog kyang srung ba ltar/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gdul ba'i skye bo la/ /de bzhin gzigs shing de'i rgyud kyang srung / /thams
14a5('dul ba): cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu la gnas pa yi/ /thugs rje'i ba drus pa gshin be'u stor bzhin/ /srid pa bgrod dkar 'khyams par gyur pa yi/ /gdul ba'i sras rnams skyo mi mkhyen par tshol// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po gnyis pa/
14a6('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag byung nas kha
14a7('dul ba): cig ni 'og tu 'gro/ kha cig ni steng du 'gro ste/ gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba de dag ni dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag dang / bsdus gzhom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur
14a8('dul ba): rdol ba dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer ba dang / a cu zer ba dang / ut+pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song ste/ tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur nas 'bab/
14b1('dul ba): grang ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur nas 'bab po/ /des sems can de rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun bcad pa dang / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/
14b2('dul ba): 'on te gzhan du skyes shes zer ro/ /de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa gtong ste/ de dag gis sprul pa de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems shing shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin
14b3('dul ba): gyi/ 'on kyang sems can 'di sngon ma mthong ba zhig ste/ 'di'i mthus bdag cag sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun chad do zhes zer ro/ /de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dang bas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du
14b4('dul ba): sems can rnams snod du gyur pa lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba 'dzin to/ /gang dag steng du 'gro ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
14b5('dul ba): 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che ba
14b6('dul ba): dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin du mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa zhes bya ba yang sgrogs so/ /tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang
14b7('dul ba): sgrogs te/ brtsams par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan la 'bab par bya/ /'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/ /chos 'dul 'di la gang zhig ni/ /bag dang bcas par spyod byed pa/ /
14b8('dul ba): skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed 'gyur/ /de nas 'od zer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brong zhing 'gro ste/ de gal te bcom
15a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis 'das pa lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun du nub par 'gyur ro/ /dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par
15a2('dul ba): bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni long bur nub par 'gyur ro/ /yi dags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro/ /mir skye bar lung
15a3('dul ba): ston par bzhed na ni pus mor nub par 'gyur ro/ /stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon gyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas
15a4('dul ba): kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur
15a5('dul ba): nub par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom
15a6('dul ba): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs tshon ni stong dag gis/ /bkra ba'i tshogs dag
15a7('dul ba): zhal gyi nang nas byung / /nyi ma shar bar gyur pa ji lta bar/ /de yis phyogs rnams kun du snang bar bgyis/ /tshigs su bcad de yang gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs/ /rgyal ba dgra thul 'gro mchog
15a8('dul ba): rgyur gyur pa/ /rgyu ma mchis par pad ma'i rtsa lag dang / /dung ltar dkar ba'i 'dzum pa ston mi mdzad/ /de ltas nyid kyi brtan blos dus mkhyen nas/ /rgyal dbang nyan po nyan par 'tshal rnams kyi/ /the tshom skyes pa thub pa skyes
15b1('dul ba): mchog gi/ /gsung mchog bzang zhing brtan pas bsal du gsol/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab ltar brtan pa/ /zung thub rnams ni glo bur 'dzum mi ston/ /mgon po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa de/ /skye bo'i tshogs 'di nyan par yang dag
15b2('dul ba): 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /kun dga' bo
15b3('dul ba): s ong la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod tu rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyis khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod tu rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag so so nas
15b4('dul ba): long shig ces bsgo shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ dge slong dag gang na ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod tu
15b5('dul ba): rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyis/ khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod tu rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag so so nas long shig ces bsgo ba dang / dge slong thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das
15b6('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar lhags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba zhi ba 'khor zhi ba grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod
15b7('dul ba): chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ glang po che glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba
15b8('dul ba): lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sa mkhan 'dron pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/
16a1('dul ba): tshong dpon 'khor gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyi rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/
16a2('dul ba): nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam
16a3('dul ba): thos sras gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris pa'i
16a4('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho mi g.yo ba lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po che'i rgyal po dregs pa med pa lta bu/ dbang po shin du dul bas spyod lam mi nyams par gshegs pa/ sku skyes
16a5('dul ba): bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri 'gro ba lta bur
16a6('dul ba): kun nas bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ nyan thos chen po kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang / rta thul dang /
16a7('dul ba): rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / bzang po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung dang / grags pa dang / gang po la sogs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po gzhan dang / srog chags brgya stong
16a8('dul ba): phal mo ches bskor nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod tu gshegs so/ /sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bcwa brgyad yod de/ bcwa brgyad gang zhe na/ me'i 'jigs pa med/ chu'i 'jigs pa med/ seng ge'i
16b1('dul ba): 'jigs pa med/ stag gi 'jigs pa med/ gzig gi 'jigs pa med/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa med/ rkun po'i 'jigs pa med/ la gcan pa'i 'jigs pa med/ gru btsas kyi 'jigs pa
16b2('dul ba): med/ sho gam gyi 'jigs pa med/ bsel rngan gyi 'jigs pa med/ mi'i 'jigs pa med/ mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa med/ dus dus su gzugs bzang po dag mthong bar 'gyur/ sgra snyan pa dag thos par 'gyur/
16b3('dul ba): 'od chen po dag mthong bar 'gyur/ kun shes pa lung ston pa dag thos par 'gyur/ chos kyi longs spyod dang / zang zing gi longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni gnod pa chung ba yin pas lha dang /
16b4('dul ba): mi brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du phyi bzhin 'brang ngo / /bsil ba'i tshal logs nas rlung dag kyang langs so/ /rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig dang / bram ze'i khye'u byis pa gnyis shig rgyal po'i
16b5('dul ba): khab nas phyi rol du byung ste rtse zhing 'khod do/ /de gnyis las rgyal rigs kyi khye'u ni dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ bram ze'i khye'u ni de lta ma yin no/ /bram ze'i khye'u des rgyal rigs kyi khye'u la smras pa/
16b6('dul ba): grogs po bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin du bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar 'gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/
16b7('dul ba): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod tu khyer na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
16b8('dul ba): brdzun du ma gyur grang / rgyal rigs kyi khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la lhung yang srid/ /sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la 'gro yang srid/ /
17a1('dul ba): rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni skam par 'gyur srid kyi/ /drang srong chen po brdzun gsung 'gyur ba srid pa min/ /bram ze'i khye'u des grogs po de ltar na bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod lta zhing 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de gnyis dong ba dang bcom ldan
17a2('dul ba): 'das rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / /rgyal rigs kyi khye'us bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ thub pa the tshom bral zhing rgod pa mi mnga' ba/ /ri dgas rgyal po lta bu'i sgra skad
17a3('dul ba): mchog sgrogs shing / /the tshom med par pha rol smra bas mi rdzi ba/ /'di ltar skye bo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing gshegs/ /bsil tshal phyogs su kha ba'i tshogs lta bu'i/ /bsil ba'i ngad can rlung ni langs par gyur pa ni/ /shAkya
17a4('dul ba): thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul brtag pa'i don gyi phyir/ /lha tshogs mang po gnas nas 'ongs pa nyid du nges/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin du bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur
17a5('dul ba): zhing lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na de ni 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du phyung zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du gshegs so zhes thos so/
17a6('dul ba): /thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ni don med par bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du mi gshegs pas
17a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin du bzang po'i chung ma la brten te gdul ba'i don chen po zhig mdzad par 'gyur gor ma chag gis ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor ba dang / ljongs kyi
17a8('dul ba): mis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i khab nas song ba dang / rgyal rigs kyi khye'u des rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ ma ga d+ha'i mnga' bdag rgyal po'i gtso bo 'di/
17b1('dul ba): 'di ltar 'khor bcas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ba las/ /skye bo'i tshogs kyi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par ni/ /bdag gi snying la nges pa'i blo dag skyes par gyur/ /skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas gshegs shul phye
17b2('dul ba): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad cing skye bo rnams kyi gung la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pa gcer bu pa dag gis mthong nas bsams pa/ 'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma bzhin 'dzum pa byed cing
17b3('dul ba): skye bo mang po'i gung la 'dug pa las na sems can 'di ma shi bar nges so snyam nas/ des khyim bdag shin du bzang po la smras pa/ khyim bdag sems can skal ba chung ngu 'di ni ma shi'o/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa de ltar gyur na skabs
17b4('dul ba): 'di la da ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag kho bo ni bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa yin gyis/ khyod nyid shes par gyis shig /des bud shing bcer te chung ma'i ro me'i phung po'i nang du bcug ste bsregs pa dang /
17b5('dul ba): de'i lus thams cad tshig na lto'i nyen kor de bzhin du 'dug go/ /de nas lto'i nyen kor de rdol nas pad ma byung ste/ pad ma de'i snying po las gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig byung ngo / /de srog chags brgya stong dag gis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar
17b6('dul ba): chen po skyes par gyur pa dang gcer bu pa dag gi rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / khengs pa dag nyams so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin du bzang po la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu long shig /
17b7('dul ba): des gcer bu pa'i gdong du bltas pa dang / des smras pa/ khyim bdag me phung rab tu 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na thams cad kyi thams cad du tshig par mi 'gyur ram/ de skad smras pas des ma blangs so/ /
17b8('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed gzhon nu long shig /des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas ma yin skabs ma yin par bdag mi bskos
18a1('dul ba): kyis blang ngo snyam nas de the tshom med par me phung gi nang du zhugs te blangs so/ /rgyal ba'i bka' yis me yi phung por zhugs gyur te/ /de yis gzhon nu me yi nang nas blangs pa na/ /rgyal ba'i mthu yis me ni zhi ba nyid gyur
18a2('dul ba): cing / /kha ba'i tshogs ltar bsil ba 'ang skad cig de la byung / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nu la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed khyod nyams pa 'am/ gnod pa dag tu ma gyur tam/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa
18a3('dul ba): bdag rgyal po'i pho brang du btsas zhing rgyal po'i pho brang du skyes par gyur kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhugs kyi phung po tsan dan sa mchog lta bur bsil bar gyur pa 'di lta bu ni sngon chad ma myong lags so/ /de'i tshe
18a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin du bzang po la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu 'di long shig /de log par blta ba la phyogs pas re shig len par mi byed cing / gcer bu pa de nyid kyi gdong du lta bar byed do/ /des
18a5('dul ba): smras pa/ khyim bdag mang du smra ci dgos/ mes ni thams cad 'tshig pa yin na/ gzhon nu shin du skal pa chung ba 'di ma tshig pa las na/ 'di khyod kyi khyim du khyer na khyod kyi khyim yang tshig cing khyod kyi srog gi bar
18a6('dul ba): chad du yang 'gyur bar nges so/ /des bdag las gces pa med do snyam nas de ma blangs pa dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po
18a7('dul ba): gzhon nu long shig / des gus par bsgrims pa dang bcas pas lag pa brkyang ste/ de blangs nas kun du brtags te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
18a8('dul ba): rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di 'di ltar me'i nang nas skyes pas de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming me skyes shes bya bar gdags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang /
18b1('dul ba): khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas ci nas kyang sems can brgya phrag mang po de dag gis thos nas khyad par rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos bstan pa mdzad pas kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni
18b2('dul ba): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas par gyur to/ /kha cig gis ni dro bar
18b3('dul ba): gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang / kha cig gis ni bzod pa chung ngu dang 'bring bskyed par gyur to/ /kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni bla
18b4('dul ba): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to/ /kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag yang dag par blangs te 'khor de dag las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang /
18b5('dul ba): dge 'dun la bab par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos khye'u me skyes ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis
18b6('dul ba): la rjes su gtad do/ /de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing / rdzing na gnas
18b7('dul ba): pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/ /de'i zhang po zong thogs te yul gzhan du song ba des ji ltar bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar
18b8('dul ba): 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thos nas des zong bsgyur
19a1('dul ba): te rin blangs nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ba dang / des 'di ltar bdag gi sring mo de 'chi ba'i dus la bab po zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/
19a2('dul ba): rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das
19a3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de brdzun du ma gyur tam snyam nas des khyim tshes dag la dris pa/ bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'ur 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing /
19a4('dul ba): lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par thos so/ /thos nas bdag kun du dga' ba las de yang 'chi ba'i
19a5('dul ba): dus la bab po zhes thos na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de brdzun du ma gyur tam/ de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la lhung yang srid/ /sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la
19a6('dul ba): 'gro yang srid/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni skam par 'gyur srid kyi/ /drang srong chen po brdzun gsung 'gyur ba srid pa min/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni brdzun du mi 'gyur te 'di ltar khyim thab des de ji lta ji ltar 'chi bar
19a7('dul ba): 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas pas 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas de'i khye'u dbang thang chen po can mer bsregs kyang ma tshig pa mthu bo che zhig da ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na gso zhing 'dug go zhes smras pa dang / de khyim bdag shin du bzang po'i
19a8('dul ba): gan du song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis mi rigs pa zhig byas so/ /ci zhig byas/ gcer bu pas bslus nas khyod kyis nga'i sring mo la sems can zhugs pa ji lta ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas
19b1('dul ba): pas 'chi ba'i dus la bab par byas so/ /des khye'u dbang thang can mer bsregs kyang ma tshig pa mthu bo che zhig da ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na gso zhing 'dug pa de la ni re shig ci byar yang med de/ 'di ltar da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na
19b2('dul ba): de lta na legs/ 'on te mi len na ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang dor zhing lam po che dang / srang dang lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin du bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/
19b3('dul ba): chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes smras pa dang / des de thos nas skrag ste/ de skad smras pa dang sbyar na bdag la de ltar byed par nges
19b4('dul ba): so snyam nas/ de rgyal po'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ lha bdag gi nye du po'i mchid nas da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta na legs/ 'on te mi len na ngas khyod gnyen du yang
19b5('dul ba): mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang dor zhing / lam po che dang / srang dang lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin du bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi
19b6('dul ba): bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes mchi bas/ de'i slad du lhas gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu
19b7('dul ba): me skyes ngas khyod la blangs pa ma yin gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga la gtad pa yin pas khyod la gal te gzhon nu dgos na gzhon nu'i ched du bcom ldan 'das la sngar zhus shig /de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song
19b8('dul ba): nas zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi nye du po'i mchid nas da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta na legs/ 'on te mi len na ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang
20a1('dul ba): dor zhing / lam po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin du bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/ chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag
20a2('dul ba): cing / rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes mchi bas/ de'i slad du gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gal te khyim bdag shin du bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na khrag tsha
20a3('dul ba): ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nga'i bkas a rog khya zhes
20a4('dul ba): byos la 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po khyim bdag shin du bzang po la gzhon nu me skyes byin cig / gal te khyim bdag shin du bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas
20a5('dul ba): skabs de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes kyang bsgo shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin
20a6('dul ba): nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod la rgyal po chen po a rog khya zhes bka' stsal te/ rgyal po chen po khyim bdag shin du bzang po la gzhon nu me skyes
20a7('dul ba): byin cig / gal te khyim bdag shin du bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes kyang bka' stsal to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/
20a8('dul ba): btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po chen po a rog khya zhes smras te song ngo / /rgyal pos
20b1('dul ba): smras pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu 'di ngas bskyed de yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa yin pas dam tshig bcas la sbyin par bya ste/ nyi ma re re la yang dus gsum gsum du nga blta ba'i phyir gtong na sbyin par bya'o/ /des smras pa/ lha khyod
20b2('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar mi gtang na gzhan su'i thad du gtang bar bgyi/ gtang bar 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te glang po che la bkyon nas btang ngo / /'di ltar 'jig rten pa rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni ji skad du
20b3('dul ba): pha gson pa de srid du bu'i ming mi sgrogs so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag shin du bzang po 'chi ba'i dus byas nas gzhon nu me skyes pha'i khyim na gnas par gyur te/ de sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/ chos dang
20b4('dul ba): dge 'dun la mngon par dad/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo / /des khyim bdag shin du bzang pos phyogs gang du bdag gi ma bsad pa'i phyogs der gtsug lag khang rtsig tu
20b5('dul ba): b cug nas yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul nas 'di ltar gnas brtan dag gis kyang mdo sde dag la bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dku mnyed pa'i tshal na bzhugs
20b6('dul ba): so zhes nye bar sbyar to/ /khyim bdag shin du bzang po'i mi zho shas 'tsho ba yul gzhan du dong ba dag gis khyim bdag shin du bzang po ni 'chi ba'i dus la bab po/ /gzhon nu me skyes ni rang gi khyim na gnas te/ de
20b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/ chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang de dag gis tsan dan sa mchog pa'i lhung
20b8('dul ba): bzed cig rin po che dag gis bkang ste khyim bdag me skyes la skyes su bskur ro/ /des kyang de shing ring po'i rtse mo la btags te bzhag nas/ 'di skad ces 'di sus kyang skas dang / ya gad dang / kyo btang dag gis blang bar mi bya'i/
21a1('dul ba): 'di ltar dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba 'am/ mthu che ba/ de dag las 'ga' zhig gis len na des ni 'di ci bder khyer la rag go zhes dril bsgrags pa yang byas so/ /gzhan mu stegs can
21a2('dul ba): rnams nang par sngar langs nas chu ngogs dag tu nye reg byed du 'dong ba de dag gis mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des de dag la rgyas par bsnyad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/
21a3('dul ba): khyim bdag khyod shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams la mngon par dad pas de dag nyid len par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas dong ngo / /ji tsam na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de dag gis de mthong
21a4('dul ba): nas de dag gis kyang khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des de dag la de kho na bzhin du rgyas par bsnyad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis yon tan ni
21a5('dul ba): bcab par bya/ skyon ni bsgrag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ ji lhung bzed tsam gyi ched du bdag nyid bstan par bya 'am zhes smras nas dong ngo / /ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bcu pa de phyogs der 'ongs te/ khyim bdag
21a6('dul ba): la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des ji lta bu yin pa smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bcu pas bsams pa/ bdag gis thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams spangs shing bor la
21a7('dul ba): bsal cing sbyang ba byas na khyim bdag gis bdag mu stegs can dang rdzu 'phrul 'gran par chad kyis de'i phyir 'di'i yid mgu bar bya'o snyam nas/ des lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang ste lhung bzed de blangs nas des de khyer te gtsug
21a8('dul ba): lag khang du song ngo / /de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyi tsan dan sa mchog pa'i lhung bzed 'di ga las mchis/ des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod lhung bzed
21b1('dul ba): tsam gyi ched du khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan du rung ngam/ de tshe dang ldan pa dag rung yang bla mi rung yang bla ste byas zin pas da ci byar yang med do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
21b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par mi bya'o/ /rnam par ston na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang / dngul
21b3('dul ba): las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang / gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po ra gan dang / zangs dang / khar ba dang / shing las byas pa dag las 'di ltar lhung bzed snga ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni
21b4('dul ba): ma blangs pa yang blang bar mi bya la/ blangs pa yang gtang bar bya'o/ /lhung bzed phyi ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni ma blangs pa ni blang bar mi bya zhing blangs pa na sman phor du longs spyad pas spyad par bya ba yin no/ /'di ltar lcags
21b5('dul ba): dang / sa'i lhung bzed gnyis ni byin gyis brlab tu rung ba dag yin no/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag me skyes lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ rgyal po'i khab dang tsam pa dag gi bar na sho gam gyi gnas shig yod
21b6('dul ba): pa de'i sho gam pa 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas de gnod sbyin gdug pa zhig tu skyes pa dang / des bu'i rmi lam du 'di skad ces bu khyod kyis gnas 'dir gnod sbyin gyi rten 'dzugs su chug la der dril yang gyis la thogs shig dang / gang gi
21b7('dul ba): tshe der su dag zong las sho gam mi 'jal bar 'gro bar byed pa de'i tshe dril de sgra 'byin par byed cing / de dag phyir ldog pa las sho gam chod par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to/ /des gnyen bshes dang / nye du dang / rtsa lag dag
21b8('dul ba): la rmi lam de bzlas nas nyi ma dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / dus shis pa la bab pa'i tshe gnas der gnod sbyin gyi rten 'dzugs su bcug nas der dril
22a1('dul ba): yang byas te btags so/ /grong khyer tsam pa na bram ze zhig gis rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa dang / bram ze mo des bsams pa/ bdag bram zes thabs de dang de dag gis bsgrubs pa'i nor dag spyod cing las
22a2('dul ba): ci yang mi byed par 'dug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ de tshong dus su song ste ras bal nyos nas sel gyis zhag par byas shing bkal te tha ga pa mkhas pa la kar sha pa Na stong ri ba'i ras zung cig 'thag tu
22a3('dul ba): bcug go/ /de nas des bram ze la smras pa/ ras zung 'di kAr shA pa Na stong ri ba lags kyis/ tshong dus su bzhud la gang dag kar sha pa Na stong gis 'jal ba la ni stsol cig /gal te des mi 'jal na tshong
22a4('dul ba): 'dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags nas gzhan du bzhud par mdzod cig / des de khyer te tshong 'dus su song ba na kAr ShA pa Na stong gis nyo ba su yang med nas/ des tshong 'dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags te
22a5('dul ba): ras zung de gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang du bcug ste 'dron pa dag dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo / /ji tsam na rim gyis sho gam gyi gnas su phyin pa dang / sho gam pas 'dron pa de dag la sho gam bcad pa na de dag gis
22a6('dul ba): sho gam phul nas dong ngo / /de na dril sgra 'byin par byed nas sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag dril 'di ltar sgra 'byin pa las na 'dron pa dag gis sho gam legs par ma phul gor ma chag gis/ yang
22a7('dul ba): sho gam gcad do zhes de dag gis 'dron pa dag yang phyir bkug ste btsal na sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med do/ /de dag dong ba dang yang dril sgra 'byin pa nyid du byed nas/ de dag gis 'dron pa dag yang
22a8('dul ba): phyir bkug ste btsal na sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med par gyur nas/ 'dron pa dag deng la khyed cag chom po byed par sems sam/ ci na yang dang yang du phyir 'gugs par byed ces smod par byed do/ /
22b1('dul ba): de dag gis 'dron pa de dag tshoms gnyis su byas te bkye ba dang / tshoms gang gi nang na bram ze de med pa dag ni de bzhin dong ngo / /tshoms cig shos 'dong ba na dril de de bzhin du sgra 'byin par byed nas de dag
