44a6('dul ba): ni gar dang glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dag sbyong bar byed pa las gyur par mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dag sbyang bar mi bya'o/ /sbyong bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du
44a7('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gar dang / glu dang rol mo'i sgra dag sbyang bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dga' 'dun rnams kyis yang brjed nas de rnams yang drug sde dag gi gan du
44a8('dul ba): dong ste/ de bzhin du smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bkag pas mi sbyang ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed gshegs te gzigs pa tsam kho nas
44b1('dul ba): kyang bdag cag gis de dag gis pham par 'gyur ro/ /gal te de lta na 'dong ngo zhes de dag der dong ba dang / dga' 'dun de rnams mthong ba tsam nyid kyis bag khums par gyur nas de rnams shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong
44b2('dul ba): dag gi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/ /bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste/ 'di ltar gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dag blta ba'i phyir yang 'gro zhes smod par byed/ phyar ka gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs
44b3('dul ba): de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la nyes dmigs cung zad gang byung ba de ni gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dag ltar 'gro ba las gyur par
44b4('dul ba): mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gar mi bya/ glu blang bar mi bya/ rol mo'i sgra mi bya'o/ /gar dang glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dag sbyang bar mi bya'o/ /de dag la ltar yang 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong dag dge
44b5('dul ba): slong gar slob bam/ glu slob bam/ rol mo'i sgra slob bam/ gar dang glu dang / rol mo'i sgra sbyong ngam/ de dag la ltar 'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po
44b6('dul ba): bzhi pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe kau sham bi na khyim bdag bzang ldan zhes bya ba dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i
44b7('dul ba): bsam pa can zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /des rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' mgur spyad pas dus gzhan
44b8('dul ba): zhig na de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can de gdul ba la ltos pas de'i khyim du song ste/ khyim bdag rang bzhin bzang po de skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la
45a1('dul ba): bzhag nas dus dus su de'i gan du 'gro'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong med par gcig pu song ba dang / khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci khyod la phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i
45a2('dul ba): dge sbyong ma mchis sam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ci kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong rtswa ka sha'i khrod dang / ku sha'i khrod nas 'ong ngam/ khyod lta bu las 'thob par 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kho bo'i phyi bzhin
45a3('dul ba): 'brang ba'i dge sbyong kho nar 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de lta na bdag gi mchis 'brang la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de gal te khye'u btsas na de 'phags pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong du dbul lo/ /
45a4('dul ba): bzhin bzangs khyod nad med par gyur cig /kho bos bkri'o zhes smras nas song ngo / /ji tsam na khyim bdag gi chung ma de zla ba dgu tshang ste btsas pa las khye'u mdog ngan zhing lus chung la skad snyan pa zhig byung ngo / /de'i nye du
45a5('dul ba): dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed pa na/ nye du dag gis smras pa/ gang gi phyir khye'u 'di mdog ngan zhing
45a6('dul ba): lus chung yang khyim bdag bzang ldan gyi bu yin zhing skad snyan pa de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming snyan pa bzang ldan zhes bya'o zhes de'i ming snyan pa bzang ldan zhes bya bar btags so/ /de bsrings shing bskyed nas chen por gyur to/ /
45a7('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ kau sham bi bsod snyoms la rgyu ba'i tshe khyim bdag bzang ldan gyi khyim du song ba dang / khyim bdag bzang ldan gyis
45a8('dul ba): 'phags pa byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig kun du spyad pas kun du spyad nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas so/ /de'i chung mas kyang bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo/ /khye'u de tshe
45b1('dul ba): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du rtog nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus khyim bdag bzang ldan la brda byas pa dang / des khye'u de la smras pa/ bu khyod ma btsas pa nyid nas/ ngas 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i zhabs 'bring du phul gyis
45b2('dul ba): khyod 'phags pa dang lhan cig song shig / srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can de de'i phyi na 'dug pa'i tshe des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ de la lung phog nas des brtsal ba dang / 'bad pa dang bsgrim pa byas pas
45b3('dul ba): 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas nyon
45b4('dul ba): mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems
45b5('dul ba): dang ldan pa tsan dan zhag lon par bzhag pa lta bu/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la
45b6('dul ba): rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /gang gi tshe des skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smras pa/ de'i tshe
45b7('dul ba): tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad khyab par gyur cing sems can mang po dag gi rgyud la yang thar pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag skyed par byed de/ mdor na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can
45b8('dul ba): dag kyang sgra snyan pa de la rna blags te nyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste dge
46a1('dul ba): slong snyan pa bzang ldan 'di mchog yin no/ /de'i skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa yid du 'ong ba'i sbyor bas dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba rnams rang gi bya ba btang nas nyin cig bzhin de'i gan du 'gro bar byed do/ /
46a2('dul ba): ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal glang po che'i gtso bo pad ma dkar po gcig pa la zhon nas kha lo sgyur ba dpal 'phel dang nam gyi tho rangs ri brags shig tu song ba'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa
46a3('dul ba): bzang ldan gyis nang par skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smra bar brtsams pa glang po che'i gtso bo pad ma dkar po gcig pas thos so/ /des tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyi skad kyi gtang rag thos nas kyang yang rna ba blags te
46a4('dul ba): mi g.yo bar sdod do/ /kha lo sgyur ba dpal 'phel gyis phan tshun nas lag pa dang rkang pa dag g.yabs te bskyod par brtsams kyang de bzhin mi g.yo ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ dpal 'phel glang po che thob shig lha btab kyang
46a5('dul ba): mi mchi na 'di rgyu gang lags ma 'tshal to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ zhog shig dang lam gang du 'gro ba blta'o/ /des ji bder bzhag pa dang / de rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su song nas khad kyis khad kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa
46a6('dul ba): dang / rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na rna blags te sdod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos dag smras pa'i mjug tu/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /sa 'am 'on te bar snang gnas pa dag /
46a7('dul ba): sems can rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog /ces yongs su bsngo ba byas pa dang / de nas glang po che'i gtso bo pad ma dkar po gcig pas tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis skad
46a8('dul ba): kyi gtang rag gis chos dag smras pa mtha' phyin par shes nas yid dang 'thun par gang dang gang du bskyod pa de dang der song ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ dpal 'phel rgyu gang gis 'dir gang dang gang du bskyod pa de dang der 'gro/ des smras
46b1('dul ba): pa lha ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa zhig gis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smras pa'i sgra gang lags pa de dag thos nas glang po che 'di yid phrogs te dbang ma mchis par gyur to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ dpal 'phel glang po che
46b2('dul ba): phyir zlog shig dang / 'phags pa de btsal la na bza' zhig dbul shing sang nang par ri brags su 'dong ngo / /lha de bzhin 'tshal lo/ /de phyir log ste khyim du song ba dang / btsun mo phreng ldan mas dris pa/ lha ci'i slad du slar
46b3('dul ba): gshegs/ des ji ltar gyur pa brjod nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /phreng ldan ma nga la gos byin cig dang song la 'phags pa de la dbul lo/ /des bsams pa/ 'phags pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis
46b4('dul ba): chos smras par gyur pa lta zhig na/ /de ni mdog ngan zhing lus chung la rgyal po 'di ni rgya chen po la mos pa yin pas 'dis de mthong na gal te ma dad par 'gyur ba'i gnas yod par 'gyur srid kyis thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o
46b5('dul ba): snyam nas smras pa/ lha ni ri brags su gshegs shig /bdag gis ni 'phags pa de la na bza' dbul lo/ /des smras pa/ phreng ldan ma khyod kyis kyang gos gzhan phul cig /ci gos gnyis kyis ko sa la'i pho brang dbul
46b6('dul ba): por 'gyur ram de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos chen po la 'os pa'i gos khyer nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug nas rgyal
46b7('dul ba): po glang po che las babs nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa da nang skad kyi gtang rag gis chos smras pa'i 'phags pa de gang lags/ des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de cir 'tshal/ 'phags pa de la na
46b8('dul ba): bza' dbul lo/ /des bsams pa/ tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos dag ni smras na de ni mdog ngan zhing lus chung la rgyal po 'di ni rgya chen po la mos pa yin pas 'dis de mthong na gal te ma dad par 'gyur ba'i
47a1('dul ba): gnas yod par 'gyur srid kyis thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag la stsol cig dang / bdag gis de la dbul bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das
47a2('dul ba): kyis rang gi lag nas dbul ba bsngags pas rang gi lag nyid nas dbul gyis de ston cig / de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan nyin mo spyod pa'i phyir shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na nye bar rten cing 'dug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
47a3('dul ba): kun dga' bos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po de ni shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na nye bar rten cing mchis kyis bzhud cig /de de'i gan du song ste bltas pa dang / re shig na de shin tu mi sdug pa mthong ba dang / de ma dad pa skyes nas mi dga' ste bzhin phyir
47a4('dul ba): phyogs nas gos 'phangs te phyir song ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa/ gang dag nga yi gzugs la rtog /sgra la 'ang rjes su 'brang byed pa/ /'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa yi/ /skye bo de
47a5('dul ba): dag nga mi mthong / /gal te nang ni shes gyur cing / /phyi rol dag la mi lta ba/ /nang gi 'bras bu mthong ba gang / /de nyid sgra yis khrid par 'gyur/ /gal te nang ni mi shes shing / /phyi rol rnam par mthong gyur pa/ /phyi rol 'bras bu
47a6('dul ba): mthong ba gang / /de yang sgra yis khrid par 'gyur/ /gal te nang yang mi shes shing / /phyi rol dag kyang ma mthong ba/ /kun du rmongs pa'i byis pa dag /de yang sgra yis khrid par 'gyur/ /gal te nang yang rab shes shing / /phyi rol
47a7('dul ba): dag kyang mthong ba yi/ /brtan po shes rab phyogs pa de/ /sgra yis khrid par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa
47a8('dul ba): bzang ldan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas mdog ngan zhing lus chung la skad snyan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu snyan pa bzang ldan nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/
47b1('dul ba): rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas snyan pa bzang ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag
47b2('dul ba): las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin
47b3('dul ba): pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba 'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong
47b4('dul ba): dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
47b5('dul ba): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung ste/ des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas
47b6('dul ba): bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so/ /rgyal po mdzes ldan gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig de'i sku la mchod pa rgya chen po dag byas nas mchod rten
47b7('dul ba): khor yug tu dpag tshad re re yod pa gnam phang du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis pa zhig byed du gzhug par brtsams nas de'i lag gi bla mi dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can las byed pa la brtson pa zhig bskos so/ /
47b8('dul ba): de na yang gla mi gzhan zhig yod pa des mchod rten ha cang chen po rtsom pa de mthong nas lta zhing shes ldan dag rgyal po 'dis 'di lta bu'i mchod rten chen po byed du gzhug par brtsams pa nam tsam zin par 'gyur ma shes so zhes 'phya bar
48a1('dul ba): brtsams pa dang / de la lag gi blas smras pa/ kwa'e nang rje ci'i phyir 'phya bar byed/ gal te mi nus na las bya ba thong shig /de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / lag gi bla des de phyir dbyung bar brtsams so/ /des de la bzod pa
48a2('dul ba): gsol nas/ yang las bya bar brtsams pa na mchod rten de ma zin nas de yang 'phya bar brtsams pa dang / lag gi bla des phyir phyung ngo / /yang shin tu 'bad de bzod pa gsol nas las bya bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na mchod rten
48a3('dul ba): blta bas mi ngoms pa srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag gi mig dang yid 'phrog par byed pa zhig zin par gyur to/ /de nas gla mi des de mthong nas 'di ltar las byed pa na bdag gis 'di la dpyas pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas so zhes
48a4('dul ba): 'gyod pa skyes nas 'di la rnam pa thams cad du mchod pa bya'o zhes des de'i gla rngan ci thob pa de las gser gyi dril bu byed du bcug nas sems mngon par dad pas mchod rten de la btags so/ /dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na gla mi gang
48a5('dul ba): yin pa de ni dge slong snyan pa bzang ldan 'di nyid yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi mchod rten gyi las byed pa na dpyas pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ni mdog ngan zhing lus
48a6('dul ba): chung bar skyes so/ /yang dad pa skyes nas gser gyi dril bu byed du bcug nas mchod rten la btags pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni skad snyan par gyur to/ /de nas yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom
48a7('dul ba): thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na des tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad sgras khyab par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
48a8('dul ba): pa/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu snyan pa bzang ldan nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di
48b1('dul ba): nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na
48b2('dul ba): med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi gnas na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/ /bA rA Na sI dang drang srong smra ba'i bar na a mra'i shing ljon pa zhig
48b3('dul ba): y od pa de la bya ko ki la pho zhig gnas pa des gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms la gshegs pa de'i tshe de la shin du rtog cing sgra snyan pa khyad par can phyung nas de bzhin du yang dang yang du bltas
48b4('dul ba): pas/ sems tshim par gyur nas dad pa skyes so/ /des dus gzhan zhig na skad 'byin cing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te a mra'i shing ljon pa de nyid la 'dug
48b5('dul ba): go/ /'dug ma thag tu bya khra zhig gis srog dang phral te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas las drug la mkhas pa'i bram ze zhig tu skyes so/ /dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na bya ko ki la gang yin pa de ni dge slong snyan pa bzang ldan 'di nyid yin te/
48b6('dul ba): des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la sgra snyan pa phyung ste bskor ba byas pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad sgras khyab par gyur to/ /de nas yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/
48b7('dul ba): the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa bzang ldan gyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa
48b8('dul ba): thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis te bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas/ de ni smon lam gyi dbang gis te/
49a1('dul ba): gang du smon lam btab ce na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung de nyid kyi gsung rab la dge slong zhig rab tu byung bar gyur pa de bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /de na 'dis
49a2('dul ba): k yang tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe 'di skad ces bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar tshe ji srid par
49a3('dul ba): tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs
49a4('dul ba): pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams
49a5('dul ba): c ad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed cing ji ltar mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan
49a6('dul ba): 'das des skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces btab pas smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/
49a7('dul ba): ngas dge slong skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes
49a8('dul ba): bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /ji tsam na dge
49b1('dul ba): slong dag chos 'don pa nyid na rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin 'don la mu stegs can rnams ni skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don to/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun du spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs
49b2('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'o/ /des mu stegs can rnams skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don pa thos nas des bsams pa/ mu stegs can rnams kyi chos 'dul ba ni nyes par smras pa yin yang
49b3('dul ba): 'di dag skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don la/ bdag gi 'phags pa rnams ni gzhung 'don pa nyid na rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin 'don pas 'di nyid bdag gi bya ba yin no snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das ga
49b4('dul ba): la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ /mtha' cig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
49b5('dul ba): gsol to/ /btsun pa 'di ltar re shig mu stegs can rnams kyi chos 'dul ba ni nyes par smras pa lags kyang / de dag skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don par bgyi la/ 'phags pa rnams ni gzhung 'don pa nyid na rgya
49b6('dul ba): shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin 'don pas de la gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa rnams kyang skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don par gnang na legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim
49b7('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
49b8('dul ba): phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na khyed kyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos 'don par
50a1('dul ba): gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams skad kyi gtang rag gis lung 'bogs par byed/ 'don par byed/ kha ton byed/ yongs
50a2('dul ba): su 'dri bar byed do/ /ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba na des thos nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci khyed kyi gtsug lag khang 'dir rol mo mkhan gyi brang btab bam/ skabs de
50a3('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis skad kyi gtang rag gis lung 'bog par mi bya gdon par mi bya/ kha ton mi bya/ yongs su 'dri bar
50a4('dul ba): mi bya'o/ /'di ltar ston pa'i yon tan yang dag par bsgrag pa dang / rgyud chags gsum pa gdon pa dag ni skad kyi gtang rag gis gdon par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag gis de dag gdon par
50a5('dul ba): bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / gzhon nu zhig skad kyi gtang rag mi shes nas/ des gzhung dag ston pa nyid na rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin ston par gyur nas/ dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang
50a6('dul ba): ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag gnang gis skad kyi gtang rag gis thon cig / des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis skad kyi gtang rag mi shes so/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
50a7('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skad kyi gtang rag bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang rag bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams khyams dang /
50a8('dul ba): gnas khang dang / sgo khang dag na skad kyi gtang rag dag slob par byed pa na/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / des thos nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gtsug lag khang 'di rol mo mkhan
50b1('dul ba): gyi brang ni ma lags na/ khyed kyis da dung yang rol mo mkhan dag ma btang ngam/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dben pa'i phyogs su skad
50b2('dul ba): kyi gtang rag dag bslab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig 'greng ste lhung bzed 'byin pa dang / dge
50b3('dul ba): slong dag gis de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'greng ste lhung bzed ma 'byin cig /des smras pa/ ci nyes/ de dag gis smras pa/ lhung bzed de chag par 'gyur mod gzhan ci nyes par 'gyur/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug
50b4('dul ba): pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis 'greng ste lhung bzed dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /de bzhin du gzhug pa dang / bkru ba dang / skam
50b5('dul ba): pa dag la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o/ / sdom la/ lam phran dang ni snod gsum dang / /phying ba dra bar mi bya dang / /gding ba dang ni mi 'bral ba/ /drang srong chen pos rjes su gnang / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngan spong
50b6('dul ba): gi bu dag na chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi nags ri dgas kyi gnas na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs ldan gyis khang bzangs pad ma can/ tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa byed du
50b7('dul ba): bcug cing ras sar pa kha tshar ring po can dag gis chal par bting ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das khang bzangs pad ma can du gshegs par
50b8('dul ba): bzhed pa na ma gshegs pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs ldan gyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs ldan gyis ras rnams bsdus pa mu stegs
51a1('dul ba): can rnams kyis thos nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma ni bkur sti de lta bu'i gnas ma yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
51a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal te bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis lam phran dag tu yang ras sar pa kha tshar ring po can dag bting zhing 'phags pa dag bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gshegs su gsol
51a3('dul ba): zhes zer na/ mu stegs can rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid yid la bya bas zil gyis mnan cing 'dong bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag na chu srin byis pa gsod
51a4('dul ba): kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi nags ri dgas kyi gnas na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig lhung bzed lag na thogs te song ba dang / de phyogs gzhan zhig tu sgyel nas lhung bzed de sa la lhung ste chag nas de'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de
51a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lhung bzed lag na bkur bar mi bya bar lhung bzed kyi snod du bcug ste bkur bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan
51a6('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong gis lhung bzed lag na bkur bar mi bya bar lhung bzed kyi snod du bcug ste bkur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams lhung bzed kyi snod du bcug
51a7('dul ba): ste lag pa nyid na khyer te 'dong ba na nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhung bzed kyi snod lag na bkur bar mi bya bar lung
51a8('dul ba): thag btags te mchan khung gis bkur bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams don 'thun dag dang lhan cig
51b1('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / /ji tsam na bram ze zhig na nas de sman pa'i gan du song ste smras pa/ kye bdag nyid chen po kho bo'i nad kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sman ston cig /des smras pa/ jo bo a ru ra gsol dang snyun gdangs par 'gyur ro/ /des
51b2('dul ba): smras pa/ lam ka 'di na a ru ra ga la yod/ des smras pa/ bram ze shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong 'di dag ni mkhas pa lags pas 'di dag la khyod kyis bslangs na 'di dag la mchis par 'gyur gda'o de dge slong rnams kyi
51b3('dul ba): drung du song ste dris pa/ 'phags pa dag la a ru ra lta mchis sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bram ze yod na de cir dgos/ bdag la sman pa'i mchid nas a ru ra tshol cig ces mchi na gal te mnga' na bdag la stsal du gsol/
51b4('dul ba): dge slong des de'i mdun du lhung bzed kyi snod phye ba dang / de nyid na smyung bu yang 'dug cing / de nyid na gri'u dang / de nyid na 'breng bu dang / de nyid na sman dag 'dug pa bram zes mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed ni kun du spyod pa mi gtsang ba yin
51b5('dul ba): te/ 'di 'dra ba za ba bas ni bdag shi yang ches bla'i mi gtsang ba za ba ni de lta ma yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod gsum bcang
51b6('dul ba): bar bya ste/ lhung bzed kyi snod dang / sman snod dang / bar bur snod rnams so/ /dge slong dag gis de dag gi lung thag mnyam par btags pas de dag gis mchan khung rlo bar gyur pa dang / ma dad pa dag 'phags pa dag
51b7('dul ba): ci khyed rdza rnga thogs te 'gro 'am zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mnyam par gdags par mi bya bar ci rigs par
51b8('dul ba): gdags par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis ras ma phra mo dag btags pas de dag la na bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras ma zheng chen po dag gdags par bya'o/ /de dag gis zheng chen po dag btags
52a1('dul ba): pa dang de dag nyid zhum nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dkyil phying bu dang sbyar te skabs skabs su srubs bya rog rkang dag drub par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal
52a2('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig gis phying ba zhig rnyed nas des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos gsum dras te bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal gyis dra'o snyam nas/
52a3('dul ba): de gri'u dang khab dag khyer nas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ci yin/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
52a4('dul ba): slong gis chos gos gsum dras te bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas bdag gis phying pa 'di rnyed nas chos gos su 'dra ba lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa la gus pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong
52a5('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na lnga po 'di dag ni dra bar mi bya ste/ be'u ras thams cad dang / la ba thams cad dang / phying pa thams cad dang / klam thams cad dang / seng ba thams cad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
52a6('dul ba): 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong zhig bya ba zhig gi phyir gtsug lag khang gzhan du song ba dang / de der nam sros par gyur nas gnas mal gyi zhal ta byed
52a7('dul ba): pas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas mal dag nos shig /des smras pa/ bdag gis gding ba khyer te ma 'ongs so/ /gnas mal gyi zhal ta byed pas smras pa/ gal te de lta na khri kling ba nos shig /des khri kling ba
52a8('dul ba): mnos nas nyal ba dang / de grang ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen bzhin du mtshan mo 'das nas na bar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
52b1('dul ba): pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gding ba med par 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gding ba med par 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams
52b2('dul ba): deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas de'i nyen kor gyi gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro ba dang / 'chag tu 'gro ba dang / grong gzhan du 'gro ba de dag tu yang gding ba khyer ba na gnas brtan rgan po rgas pa nyam chung ba rnams dang /
52b3('dul ba): nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa rnams nyam thag par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba der yang gding ba med par 'gror ma gnang ngo zhes 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
52b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis nyen kor dang nyin mo spyod du 'gro ba la gding ba bkur bar mi bya'o/ /grong gzhan du 'gro ba na deng nyid
52b5('dul ba): phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas 'gro na der kyang bkur bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong gzhan dag gding ba med par grong gzhan du de nyid ldog pa'i bsam pas 'gro ba na de rnams la bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byung nas des nam
52b6('dul ba): sros par gyur pa dang / de dag bslab pa la gus pas nub mo phyir dong ba na seng ge dang / stag dang / chom rkun pa dang / g.yon can dag gis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
52b7('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te de ltar bsams te dong ba dag der nam sros par gyur na de nyid du gnas par bya ste/ 'di ltar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag las gding ba brnyas te nyal bar bya'o/ /
52b8('dul ba): gal te rnyed na de lta na legs/ gal te ma rnyed na bla gos bzhi ltab tu byas te bting la yun thung du ni nyal/ yun ring du ni mi nyal bar mtshan mo 'da' bar bya'o/ /dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge slong zhig las gding ba brnyas pa dang /
53a1('dul ba): de la rmi lam gyi gnod pa byung nas des mi gtsang bas ma rung bar gyur pa de bzhin du dge slong de la phyir dbul bar brtsams pa dang / des ma 'dod pa'i skabs de zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das
53a2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bkrus te sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong des bkrus te byin na 'on kyang de len par mi byed pa'i skabs de zhes bya ba'i bar du yang snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ri ba'i rin sbyin par bya ba
53a3('dul ba): 'am/ de'i sems mgu bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gzhan dang / grong gzhan dag tu deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas chos gos gsum po dag med par dong ba dang / de rnams der dong ba dag la ci tsam na bya
53a4('dul ba): ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byung ste der nam sros par gyur to/ /de dag bslab pa la gus pas mtshan mo phyir dong ba na seng ge dang / stag dang / chom rkun pa dang / g.yon can dag gis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams
53a5('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te de lta bu'i bsam pas dong ba rnams der nam sros par gyur na de nyid du 'dug par bya zhing tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag las
53a6('dul ba): chos gos dag brnyas te byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de rnams chos gos dag brnyas nas ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snga ma rang gi sems kyis phyung ba byin gyis
53a7('dul ba): brlab par bya'o/ /lnga po 'di dag ni sems bskyed pas 'grub ste/ gso sbyong dang / dgag dbye dang / chos gos byin gyis brlab pa dang / chos gos dbyung ba dang / gang zag 'gron du bos pa'o/ /dge slong de dag gis chos
53a8('dul ba): gos dras shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dras shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag rnyed na dras shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /ji ste kha dog ma
53b1('dul ba): bsgyur cing ma dras pa dag rnyed na lhan thabs kyis glan la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /gal te rnyed na de lta na legs/ gal te ma rnyed na de bzhin byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /tha na khyim pa'i gos la yang byin gyis brlab
53b2('dul ba): par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag cig gding ba med par yul
53b3('dul ba): gzhan du 'dong ba dang / der dong ba de rnams 'gyod par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas chos gos
53b4('dul ba): gsum dang bral bar ni gsungs kyi/ gding ba dang ni ma yin te/ de lta bas na bsams bzhin du bzhag ste 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /brjed pa la ni ltung ba med do/ / sdom ni/ chu tshags la ni rnam bzhi dang / /sder rnams dang
53b5('dul ba): ni gcig tu za/ /gos gcig gis ni za ba dang / /sgren mor khrus ni byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /lho lam nas dge slong bcom
53b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba gnyis shig mnyan yod du dong ngo / /de gnyis lam du chu zad nas skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa na rdzing bu zhig gi drung du phyin nas de gnyis las gcig gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
53b7('dul ba): khyod kyis myur du chu rtogs shig dang btung ngo / /des brtag par brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na chu ma dag par gyur nas des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ bskal pa 'bum phrag stong dag tu/ /gang zhig mthong bar rab dka' bas/ /bdag
53b8('dul ba): gis chu dag 'thungs nas ni/ /de nas 'dren pa blta bar bya/ /gcig shos kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ gang zhig sems can rnams la thugs nas thugs rje zhing / /srid pa kun la chags pa gtan nas spangs gyur pa/ /de yi
54a1('dul ba): bstan mchog 'di la bslab pa blang ba yis/ /srog nyid spang gi srog chags gsad par bya ba min/ /de nas gang gis chu 'thungs pa de ni song ngo / /gang gis ma 'thungs pa des ni brtson 'grus brtsams te/ shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du 'dug
54a2('dul ba): nas/ de ji srid du lus kyi mthu yod pa de srid du dge ba'i phyogs dag byas shing gang gi tshe lus kyi mthu dang bral ba de'i tshe 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /lha'i bu 'am/ lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes
54a3('dul ba): nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis skyes pa'o/ /des mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang / bcom
54a4('dul ba): ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pas skyes par mthong ngo / /de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bsten te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
54a5('dul ba): phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu rna cha
54a6('dul ba): gdub kor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te/ do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad ma dang ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba dag gis thu ba bkang ste kha dog shin tu 'das pas
54a7('dul ba): mtshan mo la bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
54a8('dul ba): 'di ltar sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang /
54b1('dul ba): rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ gang thos nas sngon dge slong lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas
54b2('dul ba): pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la
54b3('dul ba): phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang mdza'
54b4('dul ba): bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
54b5('dul ba): 'gro dang yi dags dag nas ni rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /yang smras pa/ khyod mthus rab dregs nyes pa mang ldan pa'i/ /ngan song shul bkag bsod
54b6('dul ba): nams rab ldan pa'i/ /mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur/ /shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni/ /de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing / /go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes
54b7('dul ba): thob ste/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur/ /'gro bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa/ /skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po/ /srid pa stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa/ /thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis/ /de nas
54b8('dul ba): gdud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas/ /zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas/ /dgra thul g.yas nas yongs su bskor byas te/ /lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song / /de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu tshong pa khe
55a1('dul ba): spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing pa lo tog 'byor pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa lta bur gyur te/ cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
55a2('dul ba): sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong cig shos de yang khad kyis mnyan yod du phyin to/ /de nas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste/ rkang pa dag bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das
55a3('dul ba): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa la dge
55a4('dul ba): slong khyod da gzod gang nas 'dir 'ongs/ dbyar gang du gnas shes yang dag par dga' bas yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la khyod ga las 'dir 'ongs/ dbyar gang du gnas shes
55a5('dul ba): yang dag par dga' ba mdzad pa dang / des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag lho phyogs nas da gzod 'dir mchis te/ lho phyogs su dbyar gnas legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod la grogs dge
55a6('dul ba): slong lta yod dam/ bcom ldan 'das mchis so/ /de gar song / /des ji ltar gyur pa gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga yi bstan la ma gus gang / /des ni nga mthong ci zhig
55a7('dul ba): phan/ /des ni nga la bltas na yang / /mthong ba ma yin mchod pa min/ /nga yi bslab la gang slob pa'i/ /dge slong des ni nga mthong ste/ /shes rab dman pa khyod kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas mngon sum ma mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das
55a8('dul ba): kyis nyid kyi sku las bla gos phye nas yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ ltos shig dge slong lus 'di la/ /gtsang zhing gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam smin dang / /pha dang ma las byung ba'o/ /gang gis chos
55b1('dul ba): nyid ma mthong ba/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des mi mthong / gang gis chos nyid mthong gyur pa/ /de yis thub pa chen po mthong / /gzhan yang brtan zhing dge ba'i blo gros can/ /bslab pa rjes su srung byed pa/ /de yi dang por nga
55b2('dul ba): la ni/ /gzugs kyi sku dang chos skur mthong / /bdag nyid chen po 'od srung gi/ /bslab mtshams 'das pas da dung du/ /e la'i 'dab de klu yi ni/ /skye gnas dag las ma thar to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes
55b3('dul ba): dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams chu tshags mi 'chang ba las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na dge slong gis chu tshags nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chu tshags nye bar bzhag par bya'o zhes bka'
55b4('dul ba): stsal pa dang / dge slong dag chu tshags du yod mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu tshags ni lnga ste/ chu tshags gru gsum dang / bum tshags lce'u can dang ril ba zhabs tshags can dang / spyangs
55b5('dul ba): tshags dang / bsal tshags rnams so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong phan tshun zhe 'gras pa gnyis
55b6('dul ba): shig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / /de dag las gcig la ni chu tshags yod/ cig shos la ni med do/ /gang la yod pa des chu btsags te 'thungs pa dang / gang la med pa des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chu tshags g.yor
55b7('dul ba): cig / des ma ster nas de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis zhe 'gras pa
55b8('dul ba): dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /gal te de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na gcig la gcig bzod pa gsol te 'dong bar bya'o// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po
56a1('dul ba): lnga pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang /
56a2('dul ba): de dag las gcig la ni chu tshags yod/ cig shos la ni med nas de la des dris pa/ khyod la chu tshags yod dam/ des smras pa yod do/ /sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes ni ma smras so/ /de dag las gang la chu tshags yod
56a3('dul ba): pa des ni chu 'thungs pa dang / gang la med pa des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa chu tshags g.yor cig /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag la chu tshags ni dris kyi sbyin nam mi sbyin ma dris pas ma gus pa
56a4('dul ba): khyod la kho bos chu tshags ci'i phyir sbyin/ mi sbyin gyis song shig /des de la ma byin par de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
56a5('dul ba): stsal pa/ 'gro bar 'dod pa'i dge slong gis gal te chu tshags med na dge slong grogs po la khyed la chu tshags yod dam med dri bar bya'o/ /gal te yod do zhes zer na bdag la sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya zhing gal
56a6('dul ba): te sbyin no zhes zer na 'gro bar bya'i gzhan du na 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge
56a7('dul ba): slong gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo / /de dag las gcig la ni chu tshags yod/ cig shos la ni med pa dang / gang la med pa des de la dris pa/ khyod la chu tshags yod dam med/ des smras pa/ yod do/ /
56a8('dul ba): bdag la g.yar ram mi g.yar/ g.yor ro/ /de dag dong ba dang ji tsam na lam kar 'dron po dag gcig 'ongs nas gang la chu tshags yod pa de'i bya ba gang yin pa de 'gron po de nyid las grub ste/ de phyir ldog par brtsams pa
56b1('dul ba): dang / gcig shos des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag la chu tshags khas blangs pa g.yor cig /des smras pa/ de lta na de ni bden na des na bdag gis chu btsag pa'i slad du byin gyi/ thams cad kyi thams cad du
56b2('dul ba): byin pa ni ma yin no zhes ma byin pas de phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gang la chu tshags med pa des dge
56b3('dul ba): slong grogs po la khyod la chu tshags yod dam med ces dri bar bya'o/ /gal te yod do zhes zer na des ji bdag la sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te sbyin no zhes zer na gal te khyod slar ldog par gyur tam/
56b4('dul ba): gzhan du 'gro bar gyur na sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te sbyin no zhes zer na 'gro bar bya yi gzhan du na 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
56b5('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa chu tshags ma mchis par gtsug lag khang gzhan nam/ grong gzhan du
56b6('dul ba): mchir gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor mi gnang ngo / /gal te der song nas phongs par mi 'gyur na gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
56b7('dul ba): ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa chu tshags gcig gis gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing mchir gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor gal te der song nas
56b8('dul ba): phongs par mi 'gyur na gnang ngo / /btsun pa chu tshags gcig gis mang po rnams sam/ dge 'dun dag ljongs rgyu mchir gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor gal te der song nas phongs par mi 'gyur na gnang ngo / /btsun pa
57a1('dul ba): chu tshags ma mchis par chu klung gi 'gram nas mchir gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor gnang ste/ mgyogs pa la gal te chu gzhan dang 'dres par ma gyur na rgyang grags re re zhing brtag par bya'o/ /chu gzhan dang 'dres
57a2('dul ba): par gyur na gang dang gang du len pa de dang der brtag par bya'o/ /mi mgyogs pa la ni 'gram dang 'gram du brtag par bya'o/ /de la mgyogs pa ni rgyun myur ba'o/ /mi mgyogs pa ni rgyun bul ba'o/ /btsun pa 'gram gyi nye
57a3('dul ba): 'khor gang lags/ nye bar 'khor 'dom gang kho ra khor yug go/ /btsun pa chab ma btsags shing ma brtags pa 'tshal du gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor mi gnang ngo / /btsun pa chab ma btsags shing brtags pa 'tshal du
57a4('dul ba): gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor mig gis dag go zhes bya ste gnang ngo / /btsun pa chab btsags shing brtags pa 'tshal du gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor gnang ngo / /'on kyang chu rung ba ni lnga ste/ dge 'dun gyis rung ba dang / gang
57a5('dul ba): zag gis rung ba dang / chu tshags kyis rung ba dang / chu mig gis rung ba dang / khron pas rung ba'o/ /de la dge 'dun gyis rung ba ni gang dge 'dun 'thun pas bskos pa'i dge slong gis chu btsags par gyur pa ste/ dge 'dun
57a6('dul ba): gyis rung ba de la dge slong gis longs spyad par bya'o/ /gang zag gis rung ba ni dge slong gang tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / lta ba ma nyams pa dang / spyod pa ma nyams pa dang / 'tsho ba ma nyams pas yongs su dag par
57a7('dul ba): gyur pa ste/ gang zag gis rung ba de la dge slong gis longs spyad par bya'o/ /chu tshags kyis rung ba ni chu tshags gang nam yang ma brtags pa ma yin pa des btsags pa ste/ btung bar bya'o/ /chu mig gis rung ba ni 'bab pa'o/ /
57a8('dul ba): khron pas rung ba ni khron pa gang gi chu dag pa de las nyi ma nub kar blangs nas ji srid nyi ma shar gyi bar du ste/ khron pas rung ba'i chu btung bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams ha cang yun ring du chu rnyog pas 'khrug pa mthong bar gyur
57b1('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang drug gi shing rta smyig mas bkang ba 'khor ba tsam 'am/ ji tsam gyis yid ches pa de tsam du brtag par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal
57b2('dul ba): byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge slong rnams la sder spyad dag 'bul bar byed pa na dge slong rnams mi len to/ /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags
57b3('dul ba): pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe ni mu stegs can dag yon gnas lags/ da ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bas khyed yon gnas lags
57b4('dul ba): te/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du dge ba'i lam rgyags ma mchis par mchi 'am bzhes shig /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
57b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi phyir sder spyad dag blang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir sder spyad dag blang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis de dag
57b6('dul ba): blangs nas mdzod du bcug ste bzhag nas de bzhin du lhung bzed dag tu za ba dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis mthong ste smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis sder spyad phul ba de dag mi gda' na/
57b7('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag mdzod na 'dug go/ /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci bdag cag gi khyim na gnas ma mchis te/ bdag cag gis khyed la phul lam/ yongs su longs
57b8('dul ba): spyad na bdag cag la yongs su longs spyad pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i bsod nams su 'gyur ba zhig na khyed kyis kyang mdzod du bcug pa lta/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
58a1('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin bdag gis byin pa'i sder spyad dag yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag gis byin pa'i sder spyad dag yongs su longs spyad par bya'o zhes bka'
58a2('dul ba): stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis yongs su longs spyad par brtsams so/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan rgya chen po la mos pa de dag gis sder spyad tshad chen po dag phul ba dang / dge slong gnas brtan rnams de
58a3('dul ba): dag 'khru bas ngal bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba bsko bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bye brag med par bskos
58a4('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos lnga dang mi ldan pa'i sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya/ /bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya ste lnga gang zhe na 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang /
58a5('dul ba): 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / sder spyad brims pa dang ma brims pa dag mi shes pa'o/ /chos lnga dang ldan pa'i sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya/ bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi
58a6('dul ba): 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis ma yin pa dang / gti mug gis ma yin pa dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / sder spyad brims pa dang ma brims pa dag shes pa'o/ /bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams nas
58a7('dul ba): gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge 'dun rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'dug pa dang / re shig dang por spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya gyi ba dge 'dun gyi sder spyad 'brim par bsko bar spro 'am/
58a8('dul ba): gal te spro na des spro'o zhes smra bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sder spyad 'drim par spro ste/
58b1('dul ba): gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sder spyad kyi zhal ta bar bskos te/ sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi
58b2('dul ba): sder spyad 'drim par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ /dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun la sder spyad 'drim par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis
58b3('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sder spyad kyi zhal ta bar bsko zhing sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la sder spyad 'drim par 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sder spyad kyi zhal ta bar bsko
58b4('dul ba): bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la sder spyad dag 'drim par 'gyur
58b5('dul ba): te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge slong rnams kyis zas zos nas lhag ma 'bags bzhin du de nyid la byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhag mas 'bags pa dag
58b6('dul ba): lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas rnams kyis bkru bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag mas 'bags pa dag lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas rnams kyis bkru bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong gzhan
58b7('dul ba): dag cig la 'khor med nas de dag bdag nyid 'khru bar byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag ni 'di sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba dag kho nas bkru bar bya zhing de dag gis kyang de dag la sbyin par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas
58b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ drug sde rnams lhung bzed nag po gcig tu gcig char bza' bar brtsams nas de drug car gyis mnyam
59a1('dul ba): du lag pa bcug pa dang / lhung bzed lag pa la thogs te de 'phyang bar gyur pa dang / de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag lhung bzed nag po cho 'phrul byed pa la ltos/ de dag gis lag pa drangs te lhung nas chag pa dang /
59a2('dul ba): de dag gis rta rgad kyis btab pa dge slong rnams kyis mthong ste de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta bu mi mdzes pa byas nas gnong ste 'dug par bya ba yin na/ khyed rgod pa lta/ de dag gis smras pa/
59a3('dul ba): ci byas chang 'thungs sam sku 'dong zos/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa dang / ci de yang byed dam/ gzhan ci byas/ lhung bzed nag po ma bcag gam/ 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ ci rdza mkhan shi 'am/ 'jim pa med
59a4('dul ba): dam/ gzhan byar zad mod/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong
59a5('dul ba): rnams gcig tu za ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gcig tu bza' bar mi bya'o/ /za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis gcig tu bza' bar mi bya'o zhes
59a6('dul ba): bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag cig 'dron pa dang / thabs gcig chas pa 'dron pa phyogs gcig tu zan bza' bar brtsams pa na dge slong de dag thams cad la sder spyad dag mi bdog ste/ de dag re re nas zan
59a7('dul ba): za ba la ring zhig thogs nas 'dron pa thal ba dang / chom po dag gis bcom mo/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam du zhugs
59a8('dul ba): pa na gal te sder spyad dag ma rnyed na gcig tu bza' bar bya ste/ lag pa ni re re nas gzhug par bya zhing dbyung bar bya'i gcig car du ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lam du zhugs pa na gal te sder spyad dag ma
59b1('dul ba): rnyed na gcig tu bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de na dge tshul gang dag 'khod pa de dag dang lhan cig gcig tu za bar byed pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lhung bzed bzung la de
59b2('dul ba): dag dang yang lhan cig bza' bar bya'o/ /rung ba byed pa gzhan dag cig yod pa de dag zan za ba na 'dron pa rnams dang bral nas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / gong bur sgongs la byin cig /
59b3('dul ba): dge slong gzhan dag cig gnyen gyi khyim du song ba dang / gnyen dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag lhan cig zos nas ring zhig lon pas zan lhan cig bzas tshur/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyed ni khyim pa/ bdag cag ni rab tu byung ba
59b4('dul ba): yin pas bzar mi rung ngo / /de dag mi dga' nas mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug go/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te yang dang yang du don du gnyer
59b5('dul ba): na gdon mi za bar dus kyis 'chu bar shes nas gang du gzhan dag gis mthong nas mi mdzes par mi 'gyur ba der sder spyad bzung la bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu
59b6('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams gos gcig pu dang bsod snyoms za ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag zan za ba 'di dag su zhig /
59b7('dul ba): gzhan dag gis smras pa/ dge slong shAkya'i bu yin no/ /de dag 'phya zhing shes ldan dag ston pa ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa de lta bu la ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang bral ba 'di lta bu ga la yod ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong
59b8('dul ba): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams gos gcig gyon pa las gyur gyis de bas na dge slong gis gos gcig dang zan bza'
60a1('dul ba): bar mi bya'o/ /za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gos gcig dang zan bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba dang / nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa dag chos gos
60a2('dul ba): rnams gyon te zan bza' bar mi nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis rngul zan 'jam po dang / zan bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /'on kyang gzhan dag cig gis ma nus pa dang
60a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis phyogs dben par bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
60a4('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams chu bo dregs ldan la gcer bur khrus byed pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag gcer bu pa khrus byed pa 'di dag su zhig gzhan dag
60a5('dul ba): gis smras pa/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu yin no/ /de dag 'phya zhing shes ldan dag ston pa ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa de lta bu la ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang bral ba 'di lta bu dag ga la yod ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis
60a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus byed pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis sgren mor khrus mi bya'o/ /byed na 'gal
60a7('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang khrus ras bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus ras bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams nyis sbyar 'chang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chig rkyang bcang
60a8('dul ba): bar bya ste gang la nyis sbyar yod pa des ni chu brtags la bkru bar bya'o/ /chos gos gsum pa rnams mi rung ngo snyam nas mi 'chang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs te bcang bar bya'o/ /
60b1('dul ba): gzhan dag cig gis khrus ras ma rnyed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag gis khrus ras ma rnyed nas lo ma dag gis mdun dang rgyab nas g.yogs te/ phyogs dben pa gang na gzhan dag gis mthong nas ma dad
60b2('dul ba): par mi 'gyur bar khrus bya'o/ /dge slong rnams khrus ras bcus te de dag 'gyod par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras chig rkyang la ni srog chags dag med mod kyi 'on kyang ras bshal nas bcu bar bya ste/ 'di la
60b3('dul ba): 'gyod par mi bya'o/ / sdom ni/ mon sran gre'u dang mi rung ba'i/ /sa dang bskyugs shing za ba dang / /bdams shing zas ni za ba dang / /'gyod dang khar ba'i lhung bzed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
60b4('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nam gru gang ci la yang khu phrig za ba cig pas de'i ming nam gru khu phrig can nam gru khu phrig can zhes bya bar chags so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na chab khung sar zhugs pa dang /
60b5('dul ba): des de na mon sran gre'u'i zhal lu zhig mthong nas de yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa skyes pa bdag gis sa bon gyi chos ma rung bar byas so snyam mo/ /ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge 'dun la mon sran gre'u'i bza' ba dag cig grub pa de mi za
60b6('dul ba): bar lhung bzed bkab ste 'dug pa dang / lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po dge 'dun la mon sran gre'u'i bza' ba dag byung ba ci'i slad du mi gsol/ des smras pa bu dag kho bos sa bon gyi chos ma rung bar byas
60b7('dul ba): so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po ji lta bu zhig bgyis/ des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de dag gis kyang mi za bar brtsams so/ /de dag la 'grogs bshes rnams kyis dris pa/ ci'i phyir mi za/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa
60b8('dul ba): dang / de 'khor mang po can zhig pas de la brten nas dge 'dun thams cad kyis ma zos so/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sa bon gyi rigs tshos
61a1('dul ba): dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de yang rlangs pa byung na chos so zhes byas nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
61a2('dul ba): na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mi rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhags na yongs su longs spyod par bgyi 'am/ yongs su longs spyod par mi bgyi/
61a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor yongs su longs spyod par mi bya'o/ /btsun pa re shig rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na yongs su longs spyad par bgyi 'am/ yongs su longs spyad
61a4('dul ba): par mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor yongs su longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /btsun pa re shig rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na yongs su longs spyad par bgyi 'am/ yongs su longs spyad par mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor
61a5('dul ba): gal te zhag tu ma lon na yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/ /btsun pa re shig rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na yongs su longs spyod par bgyi 'am/ yongs su longs spyad par mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor yongs
61a6('dul ba): su longs spyad par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gnas pa des slongs mo btab pas glang zhig rnyed do/ /
61a7('dul ba): de'i 'og tu ba zhig rnyed do/ /de'i 'og tu yang glang zhig rnyed do/ /de'i 'og tu yang ba zhig rnyed de de'i ba lang khyu longs par gyur to/ /bram ze des thog mar rnyed pa'i glang la bkra shis kyi glo byung nas/ glang de yang yan du btang ngo / /dus gzhan zhig na de
61a8('dul ba): rgas 'khogs nyam chung bar gyur te/ de chu 'dod nas chu bo dregs ldan gyi 'gram du song ba las 'dam du song ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang lam der song ba las/ des de mthong nas bsams pa/ glang 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba lta cung zad
61b1('dul ba): yod dam snyam pa dang / yod par mthong ngo / /su la rag las snyam pa dang / bdag kho na la ste/ des 'dam nas phyung nas lag pas phyis so/ /de nas bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni
61b2('dul ba): bdag med pa 'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum bshad de nga la dang bar yang gyis shig dang / de lta na byol song gi skye gnas las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas song ngo / /de yang wa dag gis
61b3('dul ba): zos pa dang / de wa dag gis za ba'i tshe bsams pa/ gal te 'phags pa 'dir ma phyin na bdag 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sems mngon par dang bar byas nas dus las 'das te
61b4('dul ba): mnyan yod na bram ze las drug la brtson pa'i rigs shig tu skyes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus glang de'i gnas skabs de ji lta bu zhig yin pa bsams pa dang / ji tsam na dus las 'das par mthong ngo / /yang gar skyes bsams pa dang /
61b5('dul ba): mnyan yod nyid du bram ze las drug la brtson pa'i rigs su skyes par mthong nas de khyim der yang dang yang du song zhing des bram ze de chung ma dang bcas te skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod do/ /de dus gzhan zhig na phyi
61b6('dul ba): bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul med par song ba dang / bram ze des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul mi mnga' 'am/ des smras pa bzhin bzangs ci kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul dag rtswa ka sha la bzung ba 'am/
61b7('dul ba): rtswa ku sha la bzung bas 'byung ngam/ khyod lta bu las rnyed pa gang yin pa de kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul du 'gyur mod/ 'phags pa bdag gi mchis brang 'di la sems can zhugs te gal te khye'ur btsas na de khyod kyi phyi bzhin
61b8('dul ba): 'brang ba'i dge tshul bgyi 'o/ /bzhin bzangs nad med cig blangs so zhes smras nas song ngo / /de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu ba lang gi sha tshugs lta bu zhig btsas pa dang / de'i nye du rnams lhags te 'dus nas zhag bdun gsum
62a1('dul ba): nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u 'i ming cir gdags/ nye du rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi phyir khye'u 'di sha tshugs ba lang dang 'dra ba de'i phyir khye'u'i ming ba lang bdag tu gdags so/ /
62a2('dul ba): zhes ming ba lang bdag ces bya bar brtags so/ /de bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir
62a3('dul ba): zhugs so/ /mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na des bram ze de'i khyim du phyin pa dang / bram ze des byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i smra ba kun du spyad nas rkang pa la phyag byas so/ /chung mas kyang de la bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang
62a4('dul ba): zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo/ /khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta nas des bram ze la brda byas pa dang / des khye'u de la smras pa/ bu khyod ngas ma btsas pa nas 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i
62a5('dul ba): dge tshul du phul gyis 'phags pa dang lhan cig song shig / sems can de srid pa tha ma pa zhig ste/ de'i phyi bzhin song ba dang / des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ gdams ngag byin no/ /des 'bad brtsal
62a6('dul ba): bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rtogs nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad chos nyid kyis 'jig pa ltung ba/ 'gyes pa/ rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can du bsgoms te nyon mongs
62a7('dul ba): pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sems gser dang bong bar mtshungs pa/ tsan dan dang ste 'ur 'dra ba/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa/
62a8('dul ba): ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams
62b1('dul ba): kyis mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / gus par smra bar bya ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to/ /de la las las skyes pa'i mid pa gnyis yod de/ gcig nas ni skyugs pa 'byin to/ /cig shos nas ni myid do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das
62b2('dul ba): kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas kyi bslab pa ma bcas pa de'i tshe ni bskyugs shing mid do/ /gang gi tshe bcas pa de'i tshe ni bskyugs shing 'dor bas de lus rke/ nyam chung / shig shig po/ rod nyams par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
62b3('dul ba): rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo ba lang bdag ci'i phyir lus rke/ nyam chung / shig shig po/ rod nyams par gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa
62b4('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang la las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i mid pa gnyis grub pa des bskyugs pa lan gnyis sam/ gsum bor te kha bkrus nas lhag ma mid par bya ste
62b5('dul ba): 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams zas zos nas skyugs te de dag 'gyod par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gzhan zhig zan zos te skyugs na des kha bkru bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod
62b6('dul ba): par mi bya'o/ /gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag rab tu phyung ba de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya smod/ kha zer zhing dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ da ni ba
62b7('dul ba): lang bdag la sogs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta rnams kyang rab tu 'byin to zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos chen po ri rab dang 'dra ba
62b8('dul ba): la skye bo'i tshogs phal po che ma dad par byed kyis/ de lta bas na ba lang bdag yul dbus su gnas su mi gzhug go snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag la bka' stsal pa/ ba lang bdag khyod deng phyin chad yul dbus na ma
63a1('dul ba): gnas par mtha' 'khob kyi gnas mal dag sten cig / btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te/ shing shir sha ka'i gzhal
63a2('dul ba): med stong par 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ba lang bdag 'di
63a3('dul ba): yin no/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas sha tshugs pa lang lta
63a4('dul ba): bur gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ba lang bdag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ chu bo bzhin nye bar gnas pa nges par myong bar 'gyur
63a5('dul ba): ba yin te/ ba lang bdag nyid kyis byas pa'i las rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/
63a6('dul ba): mye'i khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa brgya phrag
63a7('dul ba): rnams su yang / /las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par
63a8('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
63b1('dul ba): 'jig rten du byung ste de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung bar gyur to/ /dge slong gang gis rab tu phyung ba de rgas 'khogs nyam chung ba zhig ste/ de de'i lhung bzed 'khru ba na dge slong gzhan zhig dang lhan cig kha ton zer
63b2('dul ba): ba las ring zhig thogs nas de'i mkhan po des rang dgar zan zos pa dang / de kha ton la chags pas mkhan po de la 'phyas so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na zan zos nas bdag nyid kyis lhung bzed bkrus te mkhan
63b3('dul ba): po'i drung du song ba dang / da dung zan za ba mthong nas de kun nas dkris pas smras pa/ mkhan po ci khyod glang rgan bzhin du ldad cing bzhugs sam/ des bsams pa/ 'di kun nas dkris pas gal te cung zad cig smras
63b4('dul ba): na/ je thu bar 'khrug pa bskyed par 'gyur gyis gang gi tshe kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe dri bar bya'o snyam nas/ des de kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba dang smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ci zer/ des smras pa/ khyod glang rgan
63b5('dul ba): bzhin ldad dam zhes de skad mchi mod/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis nga su yin shes sam/ 'tshal te khyod kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba lags la/ bdag kyang de kho
63b6('dul ba): na'i gsung rab la rab tu byung ba lags so/ /des smras pa/ de ni de lta yin te bden na 'on kyang rab tu byung bas bya ba 'am byed pa gang yin pa de ngas byas te/ de lta bas na nga ni 'ching ba thams cad las grol ba yin/ khyod ni
63b7('dul ba): 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin na khyod kyis ngag gi las rtsub mo smras kyis/ khyod kyis las de ci nas kyang bsrabs pa nyid dang / yongs su zad pa nyid dang / yongs su gtugs par 'gyur bar nyes pa la nyes
63b8('dul ba): par shogs shig / des nyes pa la nyes par bshags so/ /gang 'dis dge slong dgra bcom pa la glang rgan zhes bya ba'i smra ba kun du spyod pa kun du spyad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar ba lang gi skye gnas su
64a1('dul ba): skyes so/ /las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis da ltar sha tshugs ba lang lta bur skyes so/ /yang dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis las ci zhig bgyis na las
64a2('dul ba): de'i rnam par smin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so/ /gang du smon lam btab lags/
64a3('dul ba): 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung de kho na'i gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/ der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur to/ /gang gi thad du rab tu byung ba de
64a4('dul ba): ni bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu lung bstan to/ /de na 'dis smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas
64a5('dul ba): bla na med pa 'od srung gi thad du tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par ma gyur gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i
64a6('dul ba): khye'u bla ma la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i gsung rab la
64a7('dul ba): bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur zhing / ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bas mtha'i gnas mal
64a8('dul ba): la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang shAkya'i rgyal po chen po shAkya thub pa des bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu ston par gyur cig / smon lam gyi dbang gis da ltar de bzhin
64b1('dul ba): gshegs pas bas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan to/ /dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu
64b2('dul ba): dkar/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no/ /dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /
64b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams 'di byin cig /'di las byin cig ces 'dam zhing 'dam zhing zas za ba dang 'drim
64b4('dul ba): pa 'khrugs par gyur nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis bdams shing zas bza' bar mi bya ste/ za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
64b5('dul ba): ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams zas za ba na lhung bzed bzed pa las de lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung /
64b6('dul ba): lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed du lhung nas de rnams 'gyod de mi za ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lhung bzed bzed pa las lhung bzed
64b7('dul ba): kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi
64b8('dul ba): bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya ste/ 'on kyang byin len gyi sems ni nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
65a1('dul ba): gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo khar ba'i mgar ba'i drung du song nas des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khar ba'i lhung bzed cig bya na nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di nyid bdag gi bzo
65a2('dul ba): lags kyis tshad ji tsam zhig bgyi/ chen por bya'o/ /'phags pa khyod la khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po ci 'tshal/ bkren pa khyod ci rin med par byed du 'jug snyam 'am/ rin thang bzhin sbyin gyis byos shig /des bsam pa/ 'di la bdag
65a3('dul ba): gi khar ba ci zhig 'god bya'o snyam nas des de'i khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po zhig byas so/ /des smras pa/ gang 'di'i nang du chud pa gzhan zhig kyang gyis shig /des gzhan yang byas so/ /de bzhin du gzhan gang yin pa bdun pa'i
65a4('dul ba): bar du byas nas de rnams tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bos dge tshul 'khrur bcug ste/ tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa las dra ba byed du bcug nas de rnams der bcug ste/ go rim bshams nas dge tshul gyi mgo la bkur te gang du 'gron du
65a5('dul ba): bos pa der 'gro'o/ /son nas de dag bkram ste 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci khyod kyis khar ba'i mgar ba'i zong bkram 'am/ des smras pa/ bkren pa khyed ci shes/ 'dir ni re shig phye
65a6('dul ba): dag blang ngo / /'dir ni snum khur dag go/ /'dir ni 'bras chen dag go/ /gzhan rnams su ni tshod ma dag blang ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de ltar na ko res 'ga' tshod ma mang po dag 'byung bas gzhan dag dang gzhan
65a7('dul ba): dag kyang nye bar gzhag dgos so zhes byas pa dang / de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung
