65a8('dul ba): zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams khar ba'i lhung bzed 'chang ba las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis khar ba'i lhung bzed bcang bar mi bya'o/ /'chang na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /kha gzar dang / tshwa khug dang / phul
65b1('dul ba): ba'i btung phor ni ma gtogs so/ sdom ni/ rkang pa bkru ba bkag pa dang / /shol zangs dag ni gnang ba dang / /de bzhin bsil yab nyid dang ni/ /sbrang ma rnams la g.yab pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na
65b2('dul ba): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams bab bab tu rkang pa 'khru ba der sbrang bu dag gis gang bar 'dug go/ /ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang ltar
65b3('dul ba): 'ongs pa de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa sbrang bu zi zi mchi bas gang dang phyogs 'di ci zhig /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis 'dir rkang pa bkrus so/ /de dag 'phya ste/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong
65b4('dul ba): rnams ni gtsang sbra med de bab bab tu rkang pa 'khru'o zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa bab bab tu bkru bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang
65b5('dul ba): gnas khang gi steng shar lho'i mtshams su rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das
65b6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rus sbal lta bur bya'o/ /rab tu 'jam par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsub por bya'o/ /dge slong rgas pa 'khogs pa nyam chung ba de dag phyogs der 'gro mi nus
65b7('dul ba): pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis gyo mo nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams gyo mor 'khru ba na de chag nas je ma rung bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shol zangs
65b8('dul ba): nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis shol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa'i shol zangs dag nye bar
66a1('dul ba): gzhag go/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di ci zhig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis shol zangs gnang ngo / /'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyod
66a2('dul ba): 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gnod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyed kyi mgrin par rdog pas mnan to/ /de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
66a3('dul ba): stsal pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i shol zangs dag nye bar gzhag par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang 'jim pa las byas pa'i shol zangs nye bar gzhag par bya'o/ /rnga mo lta bu nye bar bzhag pa
66a4('dul ba): dang / de ldeg nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i rkang pa lta bur bya zhing de'i dbus su 'bur ka dam pa'i me tog lta bur bya'o/ /shin tu 'jam por byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
66a5('dul ba): pa/ rtsub por bya'o/ /dge slong rnams shol zangs bab bab tu 'jog nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi ni khang thog tu khas phul la zhog cig /gang zag dag gi ni gnas khang gi sgo lkog tu
66a6('dul ba): zhog cig / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul kau sham bI na sgra len gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dpyid kyi yul la bab nas dge slong rnams tsha bas rmya ste/ de dag lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rke/ nyam chung /
66a7('dul ba): shig shig po/ rod nyams par gyur pa khyim bdag dang / bram ze rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed ci'i slad du lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing rke/ nyam chung shig shig po/ rod nyams par gyur/
66a8('dul ba): de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed bsil yab mi 'chang ngam/ bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa dag khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje
66b1('dul ba): can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis bsil yab bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
66b2('dul ba): kyis bsil yab bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis yu ba gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa bsrubs pa/ bkra ba dang / nye bar bkra ba'i yu ba can gyi bsil yab dag
66b3('dul ba): bcangs pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis shes bya ba nas/ khyed kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
66b4('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yu ba gser dang dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa bsrubs pa bkra ba dang / nye bar bkra ba'i yu ba can gyis bsil yab dag nye bar gzhag par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang
66b5('dul ba): bsil yab gnyis po rtsa ba ru ta las byas pa dang / shing ta la'i 'dab ma bcang bar bya'o/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la bsil yab rnam pa sna tshogs 'bul ba na zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin
66b6('dul ba): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis dge 'dun gyi phyir bcang bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /dge slong
66b7('dul ba): rnams la sbrang ma dag za ste/ de dag gi lus sbrang mas zos pas 'brum bus gang ste/ de dag gis yang dang yang du phrugs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed ci'i phyir lus 'di
66b8('dul ba): ltar 'brum bus gang / de dag gis ji ltar gyur ba bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed sbrang yab mi 'chang ngam bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa dag khyed
67a1('dul ba): kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis sbrang yab
67a2('dul ba): bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrang yab bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis yu ba gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa dang / rnga ma las byas pa'i sbrang
67a3('dul ba): yab dag nye bar bzhag pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams shes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /sbrang yab ni lnga ste/ bal las byas pa dang / sha na las byas pa dang / ras bal las byas pa dang / ras ma dang /
67a4('dul ba): lo ma sbams pa'o/ / sdom ni/ gos mdud pa dang lus dang ni/ /khar ba dra ba 'chang ba dang / /sgog skya dag ni bkag pa dang / /nad pa la ni gnang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
67a5('dul ba): tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis stongs mo bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de na dge slong gcig skas la 'dzeg pa na 'og na shing mkhan zhig 'dug pa des de
67a6('dul ba): mdogs dang ba mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pas bdag gis pho lags par gdod 'tshal lo/ /de gnong nas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan
67a7('dul ba): 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams gos mdud pa ma bor ba nyid du skas la 'dzeg pa las gyur gyis de'i phyir dge slong mkhar lan byed pa gos
67a8('dul ba): mdud pa bor nas mkhar lan byed du gzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong stongs mo byed pas gos mdud pa bor nas mkhar lan bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
67b1('dul ba): dge slong gis gos mdud pa bor nas mkhar lan bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams gos mdud pa bor nas mkhar lan byed pa na ma dad pa rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa ci stobs 'gyed dam/ de dag gis smras pa/
67b2('dul ba): bzhin bzangs dag mkhar lan byed do/ /de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag skas la 'dzeg pa de dag gis mdud
67b3('dul ba): pa bor bar bya'i gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams lus kyis khur khyer ba dang /
67b4('dul ba): bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa bdag cag ni re shig pha ma dang bu dang chung ma'i slad du khur thogs na khyed su'i slad du lus kyis khur bsnams/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag bdag cag la yang
67b5('dul ba): ston pa mchod pa dang / dge 'dun bshos gsol ba dang / nad pa rnams kyi rim gro dang / bya ba mang po yod do/ /de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
67b6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lus kyis khur bkur bar mi bya'o/ /khyer na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/ /dge slong rnams
67b7('dul ba): bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dzeg cing 'bab pa na de dag gred cing rdeg 'chos te snad par gyur to/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge
67b8('dul ba): slong rnams kyis khar ba bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis khar ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa'i khar ba bsrubs
68a1('dul ba): pa/ bkra ba/ nye bar bkra ba dag bcangs pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
68a2('dul ba): de lta bas na gnyis kyis khar ba bcang bar bya ste/ rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba dang / nad pa sbyor mi nus pas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis kyis khar ba bcang bar bya ste/ rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba dang / nad pa sbyor mi bzod pas
68a3('dul ba): so zhes bka' stsal pa/ rgan por gtogs pa dang / nad par gtogs pa rnams kyang khar ba 'chang ba zhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan po dang nad pas dge 'dun la khar ba'i sdom pa gsol
68a4('dul ba): bar bya zhing / gang la dge 'dun gyis khar ba'i sdom pa byin pa des khar ba bcang bar bya'o/ gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun
68a5('dul ba): thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang / dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pas rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug la thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smra bar bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
68a6('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las khar ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ dge 'dun thugs brtse ba can btsun pa rnams kyi thugs brtse bas
68a7('dul ba): nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khar ba'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge
68a8('dul ba): slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las khar ba'i sdom pa
68b1('dul ba): gsol te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khar ba'i
68b2('dul ba): sdom pa stsal to/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las khar ba'i
68b3('dul ba): sdom pa gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khar ba'i sdom pa stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor
68b4('dul ba): mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khar ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te
68b5('dul ba): nyam chung ba 'am/ nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la khar ba'i sdom pa stsal lags te 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gang la dge 'dun gyis khar ba'i sdom pa byin pa des khar ba bcang bar bya ste/
68b6('dul ba): 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po drug pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/ /dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams dang /
68b7('dul ba): rlung nad can rnams bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dzeg pa dang / 'bab pa na gred cing rdeg 'chos nas snad par yang gyur/ bya ma bum dang / ril ba spyi lugs dag kyang chag go/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
68b8('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dra ba bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis tshon
69a1('dul ba): sna lnga pa'i skud pa las byas pa'i dra ba bcangs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya bar byed do/ /skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
69a2('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pa las byas pa'i dra ba bcang bar mi bya'i 'on kyang tshon snas cig pa las byas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshon sna cig las byas pa'i dra ba bcang bar bya'o zhes
69a3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa dang / rgas pas nyam chung bar gtogs pa rnams dang / rlung nad can du gtogs pa rnams kyang dra ba 'chang ba la zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan po dang rlung nad can gyis kyang
69a4('dul ba): dge 'dun la dra ba'i sdom pa gsol bar bya zhing / gang la dge 'dun gyis dra ba'i sdom pa byin pa des dra ba bcang bar bya'o/ /gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la gaN DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis
69a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams la bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'dug pa dang / dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can gyis rgan pa'i mthar tsog tsog por 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad ces brjod
69a6('dul ba): par bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can
69a7('dul ba): rnams kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge
69a8('dul ba): slong gcig gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol na/ gal te
69b1('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsol to/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /
69b2('dul ba): las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las dra ba'i sdom pa gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po
69b3('dul ba): rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsol na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa de
69b4('dul ba): dag ni cang ma gsung shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong rgan po rgas te nyam chung ba 'am/ rlung nad can ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dra ba'i sdom pa
69b5('dul ba): stsal lags te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gang la dge 'dun gyis dra ba'i sdom pa byin par gyur pa des dra ba bcang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /dge slong gzhan dag cig la khar ba yang
69b6('dul ba): dgos/ dra ba yang dgos nas de dag la dge slong rnams kyis khar ba dang / dra ba'i sdom pa so sor byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ khar ba dang dra ba'i sdom pa gcig car snga ma bzhin sbyin par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas
69b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong zhig 'dug pa des sgog skya zos nas/ des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin
69b8('dul ba): pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dge slong khyod la chos bstan gyis rna ba gtod la 'dug shig /
70a1('dul ba): des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan par brtsams te/ ji lta ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan pa de lta de ltar dge slong
70a2('dul ba): de bcom ldan 'das la dris gnod par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas kha logs shig tu lta'o/ /lan gnyis lan gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces dge slong khyod la chos bstan gyis rna gtod cig ces bka' stsal
70a3('dul ba): na dge slong de lan gnyis lan gsum du yang kha gzhan du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du
70a4('dul ba): rmed par mdzad pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo ci'i phyir ngas ji lta ji ltar chos bstan pa de lta de ltar dge slong de kha gzhan du lta/ des gsol pa/
70a5('dul ba): btsun pa dge slong des sgog skya 'tshal to/ /kun dga' bo dge slong dag gang gis na bden pa rnams kyi bar chad du 'gyur ba sgog skya za ba lta/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so/ /kun dga' bo gal te dge slong 'dis
70a6('dul ba): de ring sgog skya zos par ma gyur na deng nyid du 'dis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de lta
70a7('dul ba): bas na dge slong gis da phyin chad sgog skya dang sku 'dong dang / ke'u yongs su longs spyad par mi bya ste/ yongs su longs spyad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus
70a8('dul ba): par gyur te 'dug pa des bsams pa/ dge slong 'dis de ring bden pa dag ma mthong na re shig sang mthong bar 'gyur 'am blta'o snyam nas sems pa la zhugs pa dang ma mthong ngo / /des rab kyi mtha' ba'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la
70b1('dul ba): rnam par bltas nas dus ji tsam na mthong bar 'gyur ba sems pa la zhugs na/ 'on kyang ma mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dal ba'i mchog 'di 'dir bor nas/ /
70b2('dul ba): 'di yis 'di na bden pa dag /nams kyang shin tu mthong bar ni/ /mi 'gyur ba yi gnas de yod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/
70b3('dul ba): shA ri'i bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi yul la lag 'jug par ma byed cig /'di ni 'di nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul las 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
70b4('dul ba): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad zil gyis gnon pa
70b5('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
70b6('dul ba): pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag sgog skya za ba las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis sgog skya bza' bar mi bya'o/ /za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis
70b7('dul ba): sgog skya bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong zhig na ba de sman pa'i drung du song ste/ nad med cig ces byas nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs kho bo la nad 'di lta bu zhig byung na sman ston cig /sman pas
70b8('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa sgog skya gsol cig dang khyod sos par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /'phags pa khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni gsos par
71a1('dul ba): mi nus so/ /skabs de dge slong rnams la smras so/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pas dge slong khyod kyi sman 'di yin te/ gzhan
71a2('dul ba): gyis ni gsos par mi nus so zhes zer na bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pas sman pa'i lung gis sgog skya bza'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pas sgog skya zos
71a3('dul ba): nas gtsug lag khang la yang longs spyad par byed/ gnas mal dang / snam phyis dang / chab khung du yang 'jug /dge 'dun gyi nang du yang 'gro/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos ston/
71a4('dul ba): mchod rten la yang phyag byed/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu yang nye bar 'gro/ skyed mos tshal dang / 'dun sa dang / lha khang dang / skye bos gang ba'i phyogs gzhan dag tu yang 'dug pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag
71a5('dul ba): rnams kyis dri tshor nas 'phya smod kha zer zhing / dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams/ tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ da ni rab tu byung ba rnams sgog skya za'o zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom
71a6('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dge slong sgog skya za ba'i kun du spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong sgog skya za bas sgog skya za bzhin du gtsug lag khang la yongs
71a7('dul ba): su longs spyad par mi bya/ gnas mal la ma yin/ snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya/ chab khung sar ma yin/ dge 'dun gyi nang du 'gro bar mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya mchod
71a8('dul ba): rten la phyag mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du nye bar 'gro bar mi bya/ skyed mos tshal dang / 'dun sa dang / lha khang dang / skye bos gang ba gzhan dag tu gnas par mi bya'i/ phyogs dben pa gang du gzhan dag
71b1('dul ba): gis mthong na ma dad pa skye bar mi 'gyur bar bza' bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe bya ba zin par gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs de nyid du zhag bdun 'dug par bya'o/ /sku 'dong na ni zhag gsum/ ke'u na ni zhag gcig go/ /de nas khrus byas la chos
71b2('dul ba): gos dag kyang bkru bar bya zhing bdug pa dag gis bdug par bya'o/ /de nas dri nga ba med pa dang / gtsug lag khang du 'jug par bya zhing ji ltar bkag pa yang bya'o/ /sgog skya za ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa rnams
71b3('dul ba): yang dag par blangs te/ mi gnas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /phran tshegs las sgo dang po rdzogs so// // bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ chan pas 'breg dang gdugs dang ni/ /be'u ras dang ni rgyan spel ma/ /len dang tshogs dang khrus dang ni/ /
71b4('dul ba): gcin dang sgo 'phar spo ba'o/ / sdom ni/ chan pas 'dreg dang mdoms dang ni/ /de bzhin byin pa nyid dang ni/ /khri dang rtswa stan gcig dang ni/ /khyim na gnas dang bgo ba min/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
71b5('dul ba): tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul ba de'i tshe des 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu bregs
71b6('dul ba): shig ces 'breg mkhan gyi mi btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /nye dga' bos smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod skra chan pas 'breg shes sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/ /
71b7('dul ba): bzhin bzangs gal te de lta na tshur shog bregs shig /des skra chan pas bregs pa dang / nye dga' bos smras pa/ da dung bregs shig /des yang bregs pa dang / des smras pa/ da dung yang bregs shig /
71b8('dul ba): des yang bregs so/ /de bzhin du ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas/ de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces smras so/ /bkren pa khyod ci yang mi shes pa zhig 'di kho na bzhin
72a1('dul ba): mnyam par byos te song shig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis skra chan pas breg par mi bya'o/ /dge slong skra chan pas 'breg na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
72a2('dul ba): kyis dge slong gis skra chan pas breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gi mgo la rma byung nas spu gris reg pa na de dag snad pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
72a3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ rma'i than kor gyi skra chan pas breg par bya zhing / lhag ma rnams spu gris breg par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
72a4('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /de nas yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'breg mkhan gyi mi btang ste zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /bzhin bzangs mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu 'breg shes sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags
72a5('dul ba): pa de nyid bdag gi bzo lags so/ /bzhin bzangs gal te na de lta na tshur shog bregs shig /'phags pa ji 'dra bar breg /bzhin bzangs mdzes par bregs shig /des breg par brtsams pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/
72a6('dul ba): bzhin bzangs 'di ltar byos shig /des de bzhin byas pa dang / yang smras pa/ gzhan 'di lta bur yang byos shig ces des de ji tsam nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang nas/ dge sbyong shAkya'i sras rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni
72a7('dul ba): nyams/ tshangs pa'i tshul ni nyams te/ da ni gsang ba'i phyogs kyi spu yang 'breg par byed do zhes smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
72a8('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o/ /dge slong mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu 'breg par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
72b1('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong gis mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gi mdoms kyi phyogs su rma byung ba dang / dge slong dag 'gyod nas spu 'breg par mi byed do/ /dge slong gzhan dag la yang srin
72b2('dul ba): bu byung ste/ de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs kyi bya ba mi nus pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag la bstan nas rma 'am/
72b3('dul ba): srin bu'i phyir ni mdoms kyi phyogs kyi spu breg par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas yang khyim bdag
72b4('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'breg mkhan gyi mi btang ba dang zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /bzhin bzangs khyod byin spu 'breg shes sam/ 'phags pa de nyid bdag gis bzo lags so/ /bzhin bzangs gal te de lta na tshur shog
72b5('dul ba): bregs shig / 'phags pa ci 'dra bar breg par bgyi/ bzhin bzangs mdzes par bregs shig /des breg par brtsams pa dang / nye dga' bos smras pa/ bzhin bzangs 'di ltar byos shig /des de bzhin byas pa dang /
72b6('dul ba): yang smras pa/ gzhan 'di ltar yang byos shig /des de ji tsam nam sros kyi bar du ma btang bas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de la zhes bya ba nas/ dris pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa
72b7('dul ba): dang / de smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis byin spu breg par mi bya'o/ /dge slong byin spu 'breg par byed na 'gal tshabs can
72b8('dul ba): du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis byin spu breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams
73a1('dul ba): kyi brla la rma byung zhing dge slong gzhan dag la srin bu byung nas/ de dag de'i gnod pas dge ba'i phyogs bya bar mi nus par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
73a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ rma byung ba'i phyir ram/ srin bu'i phyir ni byin spu breg par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
73a3('dul ba): so/ /drug sde rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed cing / de dag der nyal nas ku re byed/ rtse bar byed/ ca co smra bar byed/ rgod pa dang 'phyar g.yeng dang / lus la rdeg par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
73a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams khri gcig la nyal bar byed pa las gyur pas de'i phyir dge slong gzhan dang lhan cig khri gcig la nyal du mi gzhug go snyam du dgongs
73a5('dul ba): nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis deng phyin chad dge slong gis khri gcig la nyal bar mi bya'o/ /byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khri gcig la nyal
73a6('dul ba): bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong mang po rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ste/ ljongs rgyu ba na ri brags shig tu phyin nas de dag gis der khri brnyas pa dang / de dag gis khri dag byin no/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di dag nyungs kyis
73a7('dul ba): gzhan yang bsnams te spyon cig / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag ni khri re re la skye bo mang po dag nyal bar bgyid na/ khyed gzhan yang g.yor ram/ re re la gnyis sam gsum gzims par mdzod cig /de rnams kyis
73a8('dul ba): smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khri gcig la gnyis sam gsum nyal du ma gnang na ji ltar nyal bar bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khri gzhan ni ma mchis so/ /de skad smras pas cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i
73b1('dul ba): skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gang dag ngo tsha shes shing 'gyod pa dang ldan la/ bslab pa 'dod pa de dag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag ste/ gding ba bting
73b2('dul ba): la bar du chos gos kyi gtur bu 'am/ lhung bzed kyi snod dag bcug la nyal bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /khri la ji lta bar rtswa stan dang gzhan dag la yang de dang 'dra'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu
73b3('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong mang po rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang / ri brag shig tu phyin nas de rnams kyis khyim bdag cig las bsti gnas brnyas so/ /grang ba'i dus la bab
73b4('dul ba): pas de rnams kyis gos brnyas pa dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di dag ni rab tu byung ba yin no snyam ste/ snying rje nye bar bzhag ste gos dag byin pa dang / gang gis gang thob pa des de gyon te nyal nas dge slong gzhan dag grang bas
73b5('dul ba): sbrebs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis gang thob pa de dag nyid kyis bgo bar mi bya'i thams cad kyis bgo bar bya ste/ gcig rnyed
73b6('dul ba): par gyur pa gang yin pa des thams cad kyi steng du rgan rim bzhin ji tsam yog pa dgab par bya'o/ /ji tsam na ri brag gzhan zhig tu dong ba dang / der gos gcig cig rnyed nas de dag gis steng du g.yogs pa na nye dgas
73b7('dul ba): de gyon te 'chag tu song ba dang / dge slong rnams grang bas sdug bsngal bar gyur nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga' bo bdag cag ni grang bas sdug bsngal na khyod 'ba' shig gyon nas 'chag gam/ des smras pa/ kho
73b8('dul ba): bos bkag gam ci/ khyed kyang ci phyir mi 'chag /de rnams grang ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mtshan 'das par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
74a1('dul ba): pa/ 'chag pa gang yin pa des gang zag gi gos bgos te bcag par mi bya'o/ /gzhan gyis 'chag na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
74a2('dul ba): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /grang ba'i dus la bab pas dge slong rnams grang ba'i gnod pas glos phab ste 'dug go/ /ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / des de
74a3('dul ba): dag mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa ci'i slad du gcig tu brtson pa'i gsung rab la glos phab ste bzhugs shing dge ba'i phyogs dag mi mdzad/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag bde ba dang ldan pa dag ni chos dran
74a4('dul ba): par 'gyur gyi/ kho bo cag shin du grang bas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /des khyim du song nas be'u ras lnga brgya bkur ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos de dag bgos te phyi rol tu dong ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams
74a5('dul ba): kyis mthong nas co 'dri zhing smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci khyed babs sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ kho bo cag grang bar gyur nas bgos kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag de skad ma zer cig /de rnams smod par byed pa'i
74a6('dul ba): skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i gos bgo bar mi bya'o/ /de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na steng du gos ngur smrig
74a7('dul ba): gis g.yogs nas bgo bar bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi yang de bzhin du gyon par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi ni 'og tu gos bcug nas steng nas g.yogs te bgo bar bya'i gzhan du
74a8('dul ba): na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / sdom ni/ gdugs dang 'jig rten rgyang pan dang / /bsdebs sbyar de bzhin nags me dang / /gnas med par ni lam dag dang / /la ba bgos pas mi bcag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na
74b1('dul ba): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na bram ze gos spyod pa zhig 'dug pa des gos byas shing byas shing 'tshong bar byed do/ /dus gzhan zhig na des gos mang po rnyed par
74b2('dul ba): gyur nas/ des bsam pa thabs ji lta bu zhig byas na des bsod nams kyang 'thob cing rnyed pa yang 'grub par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de dad pa can zhig pas de'i blo skyes te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs la gos
74b3('dul ba): kyi gdan bshams te gdugs tshod gsol lo/ /de ltar byas na gos kyang yongs su spyad par 'gyur la/ gos yongs su longs spyad pa dang zhal zas yongs su longs spyad pas bsod nams chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam du
74b4('dul ba): rig nas/ des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas zhal zas gtsang zhing bsod pa bshams te gdan dag gi steng du gos bting ngo / /de nas gdan bshams zin pa dang
74b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren gyis spyan drangs na dge slong gi dge 'dun ni gshegs/ bcom ldan 'das ni gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms drangs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu rnam pa lngas gtsug
74b6('dul ba): lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms 'dren te/ lnga gang zhe na/ nang du yang dag 'jog bzhed par gyur pa dang / lha rnams la chos ston bzhed par gyur pa dang / nad pa gzigs bzhed par gyur pa dang / gnas mal gzigs
74b7('dul ba): bzhed par gyur pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa'o/ /don 'di la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas gtsug
74b8('dul ba): lag khang na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms drangs so/ /dge slong rnams lam gar char pa bab nas de dag gi gos char pas gsher bzhin du 'khod pas gang gi gos ci 'dra bas 'khod pa de'i de kho na lta bu'i sbra sbre byung bar
75a1('dul ba): gyur pa bram ze des mthong ba dang 'khrugs nas smras pa/ bdag gi zong 'di lta bu dag zong du mi rung bar bgyis kyis gos 'di dag khyed thal byung snoms shig ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
75a2('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze des ma dad pa skyes nas byin pas blang bar mi bya'o/ /de 'khrugs pa de dang bral nas yang des dad pa'i sems kyis phul ba'i skabs de dge slong
75a3('dul ba): dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ni bram ze des dad pa'i sems kyis phul bas blang bar bya ste/ blangs nas kyang rung ba byas la bgo bar bya'o/ /dge slong
75a4('dul ba): dag gis blangs pa dang / bram ze des smras pa/ e ma'o 'phags pa dag gdugs bcang ba'i rigs so/ /skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te de
75a5('dul ba): lta na rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong dag gis gdugs bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis gdugs bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gdugs kyi rtsa ba gser dang / dngul dang /
75a6('dul ba): bai dUr+ya dang / shel las byas shing / gzhan yang bkra zhing nye bar bkra ba dang / bsrubs pa las byas la/ gdugs ni dkar po dang / rma bya'i mdongs dag las byas pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas de dag
75a7('dul ba): gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs gnang ngo / /'phags pa dag dge sbyong khyed ci 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir tam/ gang gi phyir 'di 'dra ba'i gdugs dag
75a8('dul ba): 'chang / de dag gis smras pa/ dgra bo rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog bas mnan nas 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir to/ /de dag smod par byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
75b1('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu'i gdugs dag bcang bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang rtsa ba ru ta dang / lo ma las byas pa'i gdugs rnam gnyis bcang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs rnam gnyis bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes
75b2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gdugs kyi rtsa ba ring po ring por byas nas gdugs kyi rtsa ba bsgreng ste grong khyer gyi nang du song ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas 'di lta bu nor can nam/ tshong dpon nam/ ded dpon
75b3('dul ba): nam/ su zhig 'ong zhes langs nas rtog par byed do/ /kha cig sur dong ba dang / gang gi tshe mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe ma dad par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
75b4('dul ba): stsal pa/ gdugs kyi rtsa ba ring po ring por mi bya'i 'on kyang lus kyi tshad tsam gyi rtsa ba gdags par bya zhing grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro bar mi
75b5('dul ba): bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong mang po dag don 'thun dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang / re shig na grong du lam byung bar gyur nas de dag gis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis grong gi nang du gdugs thogs te 'gro
75b6('dul ba): bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas grong dor bar bya'o snyam nas de dag gis grong spangs pa dang / don 'thun rnams dang bral bas chom pos bcom pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
75b7('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te grong gi dbus su lam byung bar gyur na gdugs glor bsnyal nas 'dong bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bsod snyoms pa rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / char pa bab nas char chus
75b8('dul ba): gos gsher bar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsod snyoms pas gdugs kyi rtsa ba rung bar byas nas 'jug par bya ste/ zhugs nas gal
76a1('dul ba): te char pa chad na gdugs khyim dang por bzhag la 'jug par bya zhing de nas phyir blangs te 'gro bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
76a2('dul ba): na bzhugs so/ /lho phyogs kyi yul nas kun du rgyu 'jig rten rgyang pan pa 'char pa zhes bya ba zhig ljongs rgyu zhing mnyan yod du 'ongs so/ /de ngal bsos nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya ga la ba der song ste phyin nas smras pa/ kye
76a3('dul ba): dge slong kho bos bla ma dag las blangs pa'i yi ge cung zad yod de/ de'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig gtam bya bar 'dod do/ /des de la smras pa/ bram ze kho bo smra ba don du gnyer ba ma yin gyis song shig /de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /
76a4('dul ba): bzang po dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs ga la ba der song ba dang / de rnams kyis kyang de kho na skad smras so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der
76a5('dul ba): song ste phyin nas smras pa/ kye dge slong kho bos bla ma las yi ge cung zad blangs pa dag yod de/ de'i phyir khyod dang lhan cig gtam bya bar 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ ci kun du rgyu 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam
76a6('dul ba): 'on te med snyam na yod par mthong ngo / /su la rag las brtags na bdag nyid la'o/ /ci smra bas 'dul ba gzhan cung zad yod dam snyam na yod par mthong ngo / /ji tsam na tshogs pa brtags na zhag bdun tshun chad kyis tshogs par shes
76a7('dul ba): nas smras pa/ legs te de bzhin bya na rig pa'i gnas gang du bya/ che ge mo zhig tu'o/ /smra ba'i zhal che ba bzhag ste phyogs snga ma dang phyi ma rnam par bzhag nas/ sus phyogs snga ma/ sus gzugs shes glengs
76a8('dul ba): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kun du rgyu glo bur du 'ongs pa yin pas 'di nyid kyis phyogs snga ma tshugs shig /kun du rgyus phyogs snga ma smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bzlas nas khyod kyi 'di ni mi rigs so/ /'di
76b1('dul ba): ni mi 'dra'o/ /'di ni mi 'thad do zhes skyon brtags so/ /des yang smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mjug tu ma phyin par bzhag go/ /lho phyogs kyi yul nas kun du rgyu 'jig rten rgyang pan pa 'char pa zhes bya ba zhig mnyan yod
76b2('dul ba): du 'ongs te/ de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang lhan cig brtsad nas/ deng du zhag bdun lon no zhes kun du sgra grags pa dang / srog chags brgya phrag mang po dag kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis
76b3('dul ba): bskul nas 'dus pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ bdag gi smra bas 'dul ba 'dus sam snyam na 'dus par mthong ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ma lus par smras pa dang / kun du rgyu de tshar bcad do/ /
76b4('dul ba): de nas mngon par dad par gyur te smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
76b5('dul ba): sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ gdams ngag byin no/ /des brtsal ba dang 'bad pa dang bsgrim pa byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi
76b6('dul ba): g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste zhes bya ba nas gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas 'khor de dag 'phags pa shA ri'i bus 'di lta bu'i smra ba chen po pham par byas so/ /zhes shin du ya mtshan skyes so/ /de
76b7('dul ba): nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de dag gi bsams pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin rtogs nas de dag dang 'thun par chos bstan te/ srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag gi de
76b8('dul ba): thos nas lhag pa'i khyad par chen po thob pa 'di lta ste/ kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba nas
77a1('dul ba): dge 'dun la gzhol zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag thams cad du dge slong shA ri'i
77a2('dul ba): bu 'am/ shA ri'i bu dang 'dra bar mi 'gyur bas de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong dag gis 'jig rten rgyang pan pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis 'jig rten rgyang
77a3('dul ba): pan pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong byis pa 'am/ rmongs pa 'am/ mi gsal ba dag gis kyang thams cad kyis khyad par med par bslab pa dang / bcom
77a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod nus pa gang yin pa de dag gis 'jig rten rgyang pan pa la sogs pa phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos bslab par bya'o/ /byis pa dang / rmongs pa dang / mi gsal ba dang /
77a5('dul ba): mi mkhas pa dag gis ma yin no/ /de rnams de la brtson pa nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus gsum du byas la/ dus gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab klag par bya zhing gsum pa
77a6('dul ba): la ni phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos dag go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gsum du bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams lo dang zla ba'i dus dag tu slob par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
77a7('dul ba): dge slong dag tshe ni skad cig ma yin pas ngas lo dang zla ba'i dus las dgongs te ma gsungs kyi/ 'on kyang nyin gcig la cha gsum du bya'o/ /dge slong rnams gsal ba'i dus su ni phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos 'don la/ gzhan
77a8('dul ba): dag tu ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab 'don nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsal ba'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab gdon par bya ste/ phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos ni ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom
77b1('dul ba): ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bram ze'i khye'u lha sbyin dang / ba lang 'byor gnyis rab tu phyung nas/ de dag tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
77b2('dul ba): mdo sde 'don du bcug go/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ljongs rgyu zhing dong nas ri brags shig du phyin pa dang / der de dag la rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung nas de gnyis der 'khod do/ /de gnyis sngon goms pa'i shugs kyis sangs
77b3('dul ba): rgyas kyi gsung rab sdeb sbyor dang / tshig dang rim par sbyar nas kha ton du 'don to/ /de dag las gcig ni shi'o/ /cig shos kyis gzhung brjed par gyur nas/ de la kha ton las byung ba'i rnyed pa med nas de dang de dag tu mkhyam
77b4('dul ba): 'khyam nas phyir mnyan yod du 'ongs so/ /de nas ngal bsos te tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Dan+ya ga la ba der song ste phyag byas nas smras pa/ gnas brtan g.yar ton dbog tu gsol/ des smras pa/ bu legs so de bzhin
77b5('dul ba): kha ton bslab bo zhes des de dang lhan cig kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang / kha ton thung ngur 'don nas smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyis ring por ma bton pas gdon nongs so/ /des smras pa/ bu kho bos de ltar bslabs so/ /
77b6('dul ba): des de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang / bzang po dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags pa dang / gang po dang / dri med dang / ba lang bdag dang / lag bzangs ga la
77b7('dul ba): ba der song ste phyin nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ smras pa/ gnas brtan g.yar ton dbog tu gsol/ des smras pa/ bu legs so de bzhin kha ton bslab par bya'o/ /zhes des de dang lhan cig kha ton 'don
77b8('dul ba): par brtsams pa dang / de nas kha ton thung ngur bton nas smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyis gdon nongs so/ /des smras pa/ bu kho bos de ltar bslabs so/ /des de'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
78a1('dul ba): ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /mkhan pos g.yar ton dbog tu gsol/ des smras pa/ bu
78a2('dul ba): legs so/ /de bzhin du kha ton du bslab bo/ /des de dang lhan cig kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na kha ton ring por bton nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang ring por bton pa dang / des smras pa/
78a3('dul ba): mkhan po dge slong de dag kun gyis ni gdon nongs gyi/ khyod nyag gcig gis ma nyams par bton to/ /des smras pa/ mi blun po khyod nyid kyis gdon nyes kyi/ dge slong dag gis ni ma nyams par bton
78a4('dul ba): to zhes des spyos nas cang mi smra bar 'dug pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs cung zad gang byung ba ni dge slong rnams sangs rgyas
78a5('dul ba): kyi gsung rab bsdeb sbyor dang / tshig dang rim pa sbyar nas 'don pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sdeb sbyar dang / tshig dang rim pa sbyar nas gdon par mi bya'o/ /dge slong gis
78a6('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sdeb sbyar dang / tshig dang rim pa sbyar nas 'don na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /yul gyi nges pa'i tshig dang / skad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang / ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig yin na ltung ba med do/ /sangs
78a7('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde rnams rgas pa'i gnas skabs na yang rgod bag byed pa dang / dge slong de dag gis smras pa/
78a8('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed mgo skyas kyang da dung rgod bag mi gtong ngam/ de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod nas mtha' gcig tu dong ste smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can dkos thag pa 'di dag la mi dga' ba zhig bya'o/ /
78b1('dul ba): zhes de dag de ltar glags tshol ba la brtson par 'khod pa na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag dgon pa'i gnas su dong ste bsam gtan dang klag par bya ba dag brtsams so/ /de nas drug sde rnams kyis gnas gsum nas
78b2('dul ba): nags mes btang ste ngos gcig tu 'dus nas bsdad pa dang / dge slong rnams nags mes tshig pa'i gnod pa byung bas rings pa rings par 'bros par brtsams so/ /drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ gnas brtan dag ci'i slad du rings
78b3('dul ba): rings ltar bzhud/ tshe dang ldan pa dag nags kyi me ma mthong ngam/ gnas brtan dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba'i gnas skabs su tshul khrims gsungs sam ci lags zhes cung zad rgad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
78b4('dul ba): pa dag khyed kyis kho bo cag la bsam bzhin du ma gtses grang / bkren pa dag khyed de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
78b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis nags mes gtang bar mi bya'o/ /gtong na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra
78b6('dul ba): ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong rgan po zhig dang / gsar bu zhig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba dang / rgan po la ni snod mang zhing yo byad mang la/ gsar bu ni ma grags shing chos gos gsum las lhag pa med pa
78b7('dul ba): zhig pas/ rgan pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bo ngal gyis re shig chos gos kyi gtur bu khyer te shog shig /gsar bu des smras pa/ gnas brtan bka' 'bab par mi 'gyur na re shig cung zad cig gsol
78b8('dul ba): ba mchis so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'di la su zhig gshe smros shig /gnas brtan sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la ma gzigs sam ci/ rmongs pa'i yo byad 'dis ci zhig bgyi/ bzhin bzangs gal te mi bkur ba ni re
79a1('dul ba): shig rung na 'di 'dri bar bya ste/ khyod kho bo'i mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon yin nam/ ci gang gi phyir rjes su ston par byed/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / rgan pos bsams pa/ bkren pa 'di mi dga'
79a2('dul ba): bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /ji tsam na de gnyis gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang / de na nub gcig kyang mi gnas par 'dug par mi bya ba'i khrims su bya ba yod de/ de gnyis la gnas mal gyi zhal ta byed pas gnas mal
79a3('dul ba): dag snoms shig ces smras pa dang / rgan pos ni blangs so/ /gsar bu des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bos gnas ma bcas kyis/ je gnas gsol lo zhes de dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gan du song ste
79a4('dul ba): rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ gnas brtan bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su dang lhan cig 'ongs/ gnas brtan dge slong che ge mo zhig dang ngo / /bzhin bzangs de dge
79a5('dul ba): 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis bdag 'khor dang phye'o zhes zer du 'ong gis song la de nyid la gnas gsol cig / de gzhan dag gi gan du song ba dang / thams cad kyis de bzhin spangs nas nam sros te rgan po de nyid kyi
79a6('dul ba): gan du song nas sgo la brdabs te smras pa/ gnas brtan phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod su zhig bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de lags so/ /khyod nad med par gyur cig /gnas brtan gtsug lag khang 'di na nub gcig kyang mi gnas
79a7('dul ba): par mchis par mi bgyi ba'i khrims su mdzad pa mchis na bdag gi gnas mdzad du gsol/ bzhin bzangs dge 'dun gyis de lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba mdzad pa legs te/ gal te ma mdzad na kho bos 'char gzhug pa zhig /
79a8('dul ba): de'i tshe ni kho bo snod mang zhing yo byad mang ba yin la/ da ni gnas brtan yin nam/ khyod ma gus pa byas kyang gnas ster ba gang yin pa de la gnas chos shig /de spobs pa med par gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ de'i gnas bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de
79b1('dul ba): dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas med par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro bar mi bya/ dge slong gis seng ge bzhin gtum por mi bya/ dge 'dun gyis kyang dge slong rnams la gnod par
79b2('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i khrims bca' bar mi bya ste/ dge slong gnas ma bcas par ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro 'am/ seng ge bzhin gtum por byed dam/ dge 'dun gyi khrims su bya ba de lta bu bcas na thams cad 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas
79b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das zhabs 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong dang yul ma ga d+har ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te grong khyer sa kar can du gshegs nas/ sa kar can na gnod sbyin ba ku la'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mtshan
79b4('dul ba): mo nam sros te/ mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad char 'bab cing glog 'byung ba na bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhabs 'bring ba dge slong rnams ni ji srid sangs
79b5('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nang du yang dag 'jog la mi bzhugs pa de srid du nang du yang dag 'jog la mi 'jug go/ /brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i shes pa dang mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
79b6('dul ba): ldan 'das de grong khyer sa kar can na sa kar can gyi ri la gnod sbyin ba ku la'i gnas na bzhugs shing / de mtshan mo nam sros te mun gnag cing khad kyis cung zad cung zad char 'bab cing glog 'byung ba na/ bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na
79b7('dul ba): 'chag ste/ ma la bdag der nye bar 'gro'o snyam du rig nas bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i dri gtsang khang mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa mdzad pa'i zhabs 'bring na 'chag cing 'dug
79b8('dul ba): go/ /de'i tshe yul ma ga d+ha pa'i mi rnams khye'u dang bu mo ngu ba gang yin pa de dag la de rnams gnod sbyin ba ku la'i ming gis bsdigs par byed do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das ha cang yun ring du bla gab med pa'i
80a1('dul ba): 'chag sa na 'chag pa mdzad pas ma la bdag gis de la gnod sbyin ba ku las bsdigs so snyam du rig nas la ba bzlog ste bgos nas 'chag pa'i slad du 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
80a2('dul ba): to ba ku la ba ku la dge sbyong nga ni gnod sbyin ba ku la yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa klu skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mi blun po khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la gnod sbyin ba ku las bsdigs par sems sam/
80a3('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni bsnyengs pa dang bag tsha ba dang bral ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyengs pa 'am/ zhum pa 'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga'o/ /de nas lha rnams
80a4('dul ba): kyi dbang po brgya byin ma dad par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa chos 'dul ba 'di la 'di 'dra ba'i gang zag kyang mchis sam/ kau shi ka khyod sdod cig /gau ta ma'i rigs ni rgya che ba yin pas 'di yang
80a5('dul ba): phyis rnam par dag pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag la ba bzlog ste gyon pa las gyur par mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
80a6('dul ba): dag mi blun po klu skyong gis la ba bzlog ste bgos nas de bzhin gshegs pa la ba ku la ba ku la/ dge sbyong nga ni gnod sbyin ba ku la yin no/ /zhes zer te/ de lta bas na dge slong gis la ba bzlog ste bgo bar mi bya'o/ /gyon na 'gal
80a7('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis la ba bzlog ste bgo bar mi bya'o/ /gyon na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong ba lang gi gnas na 'khod pa de dag gis
80a8('dul ba): der la ba'i bgo ba dag rnyed pa dang / de dag la shig zhugs te/ dge slong rnams shig gis zos pas bde ba mi thob pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
80b1('dul ba): stsal pa/ la ba bzlog ste gyon pas 'dug par bya/ nyal bar bya'i bcag par ni mi bya'o/ sdom ni/ be'u ras dang ni la ba dang / de bzhin la ba'i mchog dang ni/ /sgrog mig sgrog rten mdud pa dang / /ska rags dag ni gsum yin
80b2('dul ba): no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal te dge
80b3('dul ba): 'dun la be'u ras grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing snga ma bzhin te/ dge 'dun
80b4('dul ba): la la ba grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs shing snga ma bzhin te/ dge 'dun la la ba
80b5('dul ba): mchog grub na yang gnang la/ gang zag la yang gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa
80b6('dul ba): zhig 'dug pa de snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na chos gos nar nas/ des myur ba myur bar lhung bzed sa la bzhag nas de tshags
80b7('dul ba): byas pa dang / de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya zhing dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams ni gtsang sbra med de/ lhung bzed bab bab tu 'jog go zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
80b8('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis lhung bzed bab bab tu bzhag par mi bya'o/ /dge slong lhung bzed bab bab tu 'jog na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang chos gos bsrung ba'i phyir chos
81a1('dul ba): gos kyi sgrog mig gdags par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis btags pa dang / des chos gos ral nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgrog zungs kyis glon la thogs shig /dge slong rnams kyis
81a2('dul ba): sgrog zungs kyis glan nas btags pa dang / de sgrog mdud med pas ma chags te nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdud pa bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal
81a3('dul ba): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan yod na dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig 'dug pa de snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod
81a4('dul ba): snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ /de bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na smad g.yogs snyil ba dang / des myur ba myur bar lhung bzed sa la bzhag ste/ de tshags bcos so/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas zhes bya ba
81a5('dul ba): snga ma bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos bsrung ba'i phyir ska rags rnam pa gsum po/ shur bu dang / shur bu phre'u dang / lcag phod bcang bar bya'o// //'dul ba phran tshegs kyi
81a6('dul ba): gzhi/ bam po bdun pa/ sdom ni/ ston pa ser skya'i gnas bzhugs pas/ /rgyan spel ma dang chang phrul can/ /zla gam dang ni gser skud can/ /khra bo thams cad bkag pa yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
81a7('dul ba): ser skya'i gnas na n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe shAkya ming chen gyi khyim gyi zhal ta ba dus las 'das pa dang / ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag shAkya ming chen ga la ba der song ste smras pa/
81a8('dul ba): rje khyod kyi khab kyi zhal ta ba gum na/ zhal ta ba gzhan zhig bsko bar gsol/ des de'i drung na bram ze'i khye'u zhig 'dug pa de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re shig khyod song shig /ji tsam na zhal ta ba gzhan zhig btang ngo / /
81b1('dul ba): de song nas des chos bzhin du rigs par spyad pas dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes rab tu mang por phul ba dang / shAkya ming chen gyis smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dpya nar ma dang bla skyes 'di ltar mang ba khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs
81b2('dul ba): la gnod par ma byas grang / des smras pa/ rje dpya nar ma dang bla skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags te/ bdag gis skye bo'i tshogs la gnod pa bgyis pa ma lags so/ /des ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs
81b3('dul ba): de la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u 'dis khyed 'ga' la gnod pa mi byed grang / rje dpya nar ma dang bla skyes 'di rigs pas mchis pa lags te/ 'dis 'ga' la yang gnod pa ma bgyis so zhes smras pa dang /
81b4('dul ba): des de ri brag gi zhal ta bar bcug go/ /'jig rten ni 'byor pa 'dod cing rgud pa dang mi mthun pa yin pas de la bram ze gzhan zhig gis bu mo byin pa dang / des de nyi ma dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dang sbyar nas bag mar blangs so/ /de
81b5('dul ba): de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu khye'u zhig btsas te/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming
81b6('dul ba): btags so/ /yang de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas ming zla ba zhes bya bar btags so/ /de bskyed bsrings te chen mor gyur pa dang / de mkhas shing spyod
81b7('dul ba): lam dang 'gro 'dug 'o gze bas ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyi yid du 'ong bar gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bram ze'i khye'u de na bar gyur nas rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras
81b8('dul ba): bu'i sman gyis rim gro byas kyang nad de zhi bar ma gyur nas/ ri brags pa des dpya nar ma dang / bla skyes phul ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad spyad cing skyin po gzhan dag blangs nas/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas de de nyid du dus
82a1('dul ba): las 'das so/ /ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag shAkya ming chen ga la ba der 'ongs te smras pa/ rje zhal ta ba de ni gum lags so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag de na dpya nar ma dang bla skyes su
82a2('dul ba): phul ba yod dam/ rje te por mang du phul mod kyi des bro 'tshal ba'i yo byad tu spyad na 'on kyang sos par ma gyur nas skyin po gzhan dag kyang bgyis so/ /deng la de na lhag ma cung zad ci yod pa des bu lon sobs shig /rje de na
82a3('dul ba): cung zad kyang ma mchis te/ lus par btab na de'i mchis brang dang / bu pho dang bu mo mchis te/ de'i bu mo de mkhas shing spyod lam dang 'gro 'dug 'o gze ba lags pas ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams
82a4('dul ba): cad kyi yid du mchi bar gyur to/ /ming chen gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag de'i chung ma dang bu pho dag ci dgar thong la bu mo de 'dir khug shig /de rnams kyis de'i chung ma dang bu pho de dag ci dgar btang nas bu mo de ming chen gyi gan du
82a5('dul ba): khrid do/ /shAkya ming chen gyi chung ma rgan mo gcig kha zas g.yo ba dang / me tog 'thu ba'i las rnam gnyis byed pa des smras pa/ jo bo de ni bdag shin du rgas pas sug las rnam gnyis bgyid rngo mi thog na/ zla ba 'di bdag gi
82a6('dul ba): ngan grogs su bskor gsol/ des de ngan grogs su bskos so/ /des de la smras pa/ zla ba khyod ni kun dga' ra bar song la me tog thus shig /ngas ni kha zas g.yo 'o/ /de kun dga' ra bar song nas me tog btus te
82a7('dul ba): de nas phreng ba legs par brgyus nas ming chen gyi gan du song ba dang / des mthong nas yongs su dga' ste smras pa/ legs so zhog shig ces smras nas chung ma rgan mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci'i phyir sngon ni
82a8('dul ba): me tog nyung la de ring mang bar gyur/ des smras pa/ sngon ni khyod kyi gnyen dag mchis nas bdag la slong ba na bdag gis de dag la stsal la/ 'dis ni su la yang ma stsal ba dang bdag ni rgas pas mig rtul la/ 'di ni/
82b1('dul ba): mig rno bas thu mkhas pa las gyur to/ /des smras pa/ gal te de lta na de kun dga' ra bar thong la der zhog shig /des de kun dga' ra ba de nyid du bzhag pa dang / de me tog gi phreng ba bzang po rgyud par byed pas de'i ming phreng
82b2('dul ba): ldan ma phreng ldan ma zhes bya bar grags so/ /dus gzhan zhig na de khyim nas rang gi zan blang te kun dga' ra bar song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /des bcom ldan 'das sku blta
82b3('dul ba): bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas shin du bde zhing rab tu dga' bas rtog par byed cing bsams pa/ 'di lta bu'i yon gnas yang dag pa la bdag gis bya ba ma byas pas des na bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur
82b4('dul ba): par gdon ma zos so/ /de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag las bsod snyoms bzhes na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo snyam pa dang / skabs de lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi
82b5('dul ba): mkhyen pa dang / mi gzigs pa dang / mi rig pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga' bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ni chos nyid kyis zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin ces bya ba'i bar snga ma
82b6('dul ba): bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rjes su gzung ba'i phyir lhung bzed bzhed de sring mo khyod kyis gal te yongs su btang na lhung bzed 'dir byin cig ces bka' stsal ba dang / des shin du dad pas bcom ldan 'das la
82b7('dul ba): bsod snyoms de phul nas zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bran mo dang dbul por mi 'gyur ba shog shig /ji tsam na de'i pha'i grogs po bram ze mtshan mkhan
82b8('dul ba): zhig yod pa des de mthong nas smras pa/ bu mo khyod ga las 'ongs/ ri brags de kho na nas so/ /su la gnas shing 'dug des smras pa/ gang na skal pa chung ngu gnas pa na ste/ bdag ming chen gyi bran mor bgyis so/ /khyod kyi
83a1('dul ba): pha de gar song / gum mo/ ma dang ming po de dag gar dong / gar mchis ma 'tshal to/ /zla ba khyod bran mo'i 'os ma yin na lag pa rkyongs shig dang blta'o/ /des lag pa brkyang ba dang / des bltas nas tshigs
83a2('dul ba): su bcad de smras pa/ gang gi lag pa'i mthil dag la/ /lcags kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa/ /bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /rgyal po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur/ /gang gi bzhin ni rgyas pa dang / /ngang pa'i
83a3('dul ba): rgyal po'i gdangs 'dra ba/ /bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /rgyal po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur/ /gang gi rkang pa'i mthil dag la/ /grong khyer lcog dang rta babs bcas/ /bran gyi rigs su skyes gyur kyang / /
83a4('dul ba): rgyal po'i btsun mor bzhes par 'gyur/ /khyod mi dga' ba ma byed par song shig dang / khyod bran mor mi 'gyur gyi khyod rgyal po'i btsun mor 'gyur ro/ /de gnas de nas skyed mos tshal du song ba dang yul ko sa la'i rgyal po
83a5('dul ba): gsal rgyal ri dgas shor du chas pa rtas kha khyer te/ gcig pu ser skya'i gnas su phyin to/ /de phan tshun 'khyams pa las ming chen gyi kun dga' ra bar song nas des bu mo de la dris pa/ bu mo 'di su'i kun dga' ra ba yin/ des
83a6('dul ba): smras pa/ lha shAkya ming chen gyi lags so/ /des rta las babs te smras pa/ bu mo rkang pa bkrus chu long shig /des shin du myur bar rdzing bur song ste nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis bsros pa'i chu blangs pa dang / des rkang pa bkrus nas yud tsam zhig
83a7('dul ba): bsdad 'di smras pa/ bu mo gdong bkrus chu longs shig /des chu'i steng rim lag pas bsal te/ chu ha cang dro ba yang ma yin ha cang grang ba yang ma yin pa blangs nas des gdong bkrus so/ /des yang smras pa/ bu mo btung dgos
83a8('dul ba): gyi chu long shig / des chu rnam par glongs te chu bsil ba'i lo ma'i snod du blangs pa rgyal pos 'thungs nas smras pa/ bu mo kun dga' ra ba 'di na rdzing bu gsum yod dam ci na khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum khyer te 'ongs/ des smras
83b1('dul ba): pa lha 'di na rdzing bu gcig kho na mchis kyi/ gsum ni ma mchis so/ /des smras pa/ 'o na khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum ga las khyer te 'ongs/ des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ des ni go'o 'di 'dri bar bya
83b2('dul ba): ste/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis chu rnam pa gsum khyer te 'ongs/ des smras pa/ lha bdag gis dang por chab dron po 'tshal te mchis pa ni lha mnyel bsos par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /slad kyis ha cang dro ba yang ma lags ha cang grang ba yang
83b3('dul ba): ma lags pa 'tshal te mchis pa ni dro ba dang grang ba gang lags pa dag spyan la gnod pa spang ba'i slad du'o/ /rnam par glongs nas shin du bsil ba 'tshal te mchis pa ni lha skyems pa dang bral bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ /des bsams pa/
83b4('dul ba): bu mo 'di ni mkhas pa yin no snyam du rig nas smras pa/ bu mo mdzangs shing mkhas pa khyod rkang pa mnye dgos kyis re shig mal chos shig /des de'i rkang pa mnyes pa dang / de reg bya dang ldan pa yin pas mnyes ma thag nyid
83b5('dul ba): du de gnyid log go/ /de gnyid log pa dang / des bsams pa/ rgyal po 'di dag la ni dgra mang bas gal te 'di gnyid log pa la 'ga' zhig gis gnod pa byas na nges par bdag gi rje bo la grags pa ma yin par 'gyur
83b6('dul ba): bas sgo gcad par bya'o snyam nas/ des sgo bcad de 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na gcig nas gcig tu thos te dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dag bskyed mos tshal der lhags nas de rnams sgo phye zhes zer ro/ /des sgo ma phye ba dang /
83b7('dul ba): rgyal po ku cho'i sgras sad nas smras pa/ bu mo de ci zhig /des smras pa/ lha mi dag cig chab sgo phye zhes mchi zhing / lha'i mtshan kyang smos so/ /des smras pa/ bu mo sgo 'di sus bcad/ lha bdag gis bkum mo/ /
83b8('dul ba): ci'i phyir bcad/ lha bdag gi glo ba la rgyal po 'di dag la ni dgra mang bas gal te 'di mnal log pa la 'ga' zhig gis gnod pa bgyis na nges par bdag gi rje bo la grags pa ma lags par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas
84a1('dul ba): de'i slad du bdag gis chab sgo bkum mo/ /des smras pa/ bu mo 'dzangs ma khyod la nga'i the tshom 'di 'dri bar bya ste/ re shig khyod ming chen gyi cir 'ong smros shig /des smras pa/ bdag de'i mngag gzhug bgyid pa'i bran
84a2('dul ba): mo lags so khyod de'i mngag gzhug byed pa'i bran mo ma yin gyi/ khyod nges par de'i bu mo yin gyis khyod kyis drang por smros shig /de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod ming chen gyi gan du song la/ rgyal
84a3('dul ba): po gsal rgyal khyod kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes byos shig / de myur ba myur bar song ste/ jo bo ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal khyod kyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes smras so/ /shAkya ming chen gyis thos
84a4('dul ba): nas bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / dri dang phreng ba dag bshams nas/ skye bo phal po ches bskor te kun dga' ra bar song ngo / /de nas gcig la gcig byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun du spyad pas so so yang dag
84a5('dul ba): par dga' bar byas nas rgyal po khrus byas shing zan zos nas gtam dag byas te yud tsam zhig bsdad nas smras pa/ ming chen bu mo 'di khyod kyi cir 'ong / lha mngag gzhug bgyid pa'i bran mo lags so/ /'di khyod kyi mngag
84a6('dul ba): gzhug byed pa'i bran mo ma yin gyi/ 'di khyod kyi bu mo yin gyis nga la byin cig /des smras pa/ lha shAkya'i bu mo gzhan 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa dag mchis na de dag bzhes su gsol/ 'di cir 'tshal
84a7('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di nyid nga la dgos kyis/ 'di nga la byin cig /des smras pa/ lha gal te de lta na tshul bzhin bgyis te dbul lo/ /de bzhin byos shig /de nas shAkya ming chen gyis grong khyer mdzes par byed du
84a8('dul ba): bcug ste/ bu mo de rgyan thams cad kyis klubs nas glang po che la bskyon te lam po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu grong khyer ser skya'i gnas na 'khod pa dang / yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i
84b1('dul ba): tshogs la shes ldan dag nyon cig shAkya ming chen gyi bu mo phreng ldan ma ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mor phul lo zhes dril bsgrags pa byas so/ /de nas de ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mor
84b2('dul ba): phul bar skye bo phal po che rnams kyis kyang shes so/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dpal gyi 'byor ba chen pos blangs nas mnyan yod du khrid pa dang / de'i mas bdag gi bus bran mo chung mar blangs so/ /
84b3('dul ba): zhes thos te/ de kun nas dkris pa skyes nas bsam pa/ 'di ni nges par pha de'i bu ma yin pa 'am/ bdag gi khong du don med pa zhig bsrel te/ 'di ltar bran mo'i khyor skyes par gyur to snyam nas/ de yang sems khongs
84b4('dul ba): su chud cing 'dug pa dang rgyal pos kyang phreng ldan ma la smras pa/ phreng ldan ma song la sgyug mo'i zhabs la phyag byos shig /de song ste de'i rkang pa gnyis la bzung ba dang / de reg bya dang ldan pa yin pas des reg pa
84b5('dul ba): tsam gyis de gnyid log ste sad nas bsams pa/ bu zan ma'i bu mo 'di'i reg pa 'di 'dra bas ko sa la'i rigs 'di rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /de'i tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la/ btsun mo dam pa rgyal rigs
84b6('dul ba): dbyar tshul ma dang / phreng ldan ma gnyis yod de/ gang gi tshe rgyal po phreng ldan ma dang thabs gcig bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ phreng ldan ma rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma ni 'di lta bur yang gzugs bzang ngo zhes dbyar tshul ma'i bsngags
84b7('dul ba): pa brjod pa dang / des smras pa/ lha de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ma rings shig dang ring po mi thogs par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de re ba dang bcas pas 'dug go/ /gang gi tshe rgyal
84b8('dul ba): rigs dbyar tshul ma dang thabs gcig tu 'dug pa de'i tshe yang dbyar tshul ma phreng ldan ma ni de lta bu'i reg bya dang yang ldan pa yin no zhes phreng ldan ma'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang / des smras pa lha de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar
85a1('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ma rings shig dang ring por mi thogs par mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag rgyal pos ji lta ji ltar ya mtshan bskyed pa de ltar phan tshun mthong bar spro bar gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan
85a2('dul ba): zhig na so ka'i dus la bab ste/ nags tshal na shing rnams me tog rgyas par gyur cing ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i bskyed mos tshal gyi gnas su rgyal
85a3('dul ba): po btsun mo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing gshegs so/ /bud med ni me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas bskyed mos tshal de dang de dag tu 'khyam par brtsams pa dang / rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma ngal bas skyo
85a4('dul ba): zhing snyom par gyur nas shing mya ngan 'tshang la snyes te 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na phreng ldan mas mthong ngo / /de de'i gzugs bzang ba mthong bas shing gi lha mo yin no snyam du rig nas mod la rkang pa la phyag byas pa dang / phreng ldan ma'i lag
85a5('dul ba): pas reg ma thag pa nyid du gnyid log par gyur to/ /ji tsam na rgyal pos dbyar tshul ma la phreng ldan ma'i bsngags pa brjod par brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ lha de bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras
85a6('dul ba): pa/ de khyod kyis mthong ngo / /lha bdag mi dran no/ /ngas khyod dran par bya'o/ /legs so/ /gang gi lag pa gnyis kyi khyod kyi rkang pa la bzung ba de dran nam/ lha de lha mo phreng ldan ma lags sam/ de yin no/ /lha gang khyod reg bya dang ldan pa'i
85a7('dul ba): btsun mo de lta bu spangs te bdag gi drung du gshegs pa de ni khyod bdag la nges par byams shing thugs gcugs pa lags so/ /de bzhin du phreng ldan ma la dbyar tshul ma ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes bsngags pa brjod par
85a8('dul ba): brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ lha bdag gis nam zhig na mthong bar 'gyur lags/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de khyod kyis mthong ngo / /lha bdag mi dran no/ /ngas khyod dran par bya'o/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis shing mya ngan 'tshang
85b1('dul ba): la bsnyes te 'dug pa gang la phyag byas pa de dran nam/ lha ci de dbyar tshul ma lags sam/ de yin no/ /lha gang khyod kyis btsun mo gzugs bzang ba de lta bu spangs te bdag gi drung du gshegs pa de ni khyod nges par bdag la
85b2('dul ba): byams shing thugs bcugs pa lags so/ /skabs der ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la btsun mo dam pa rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / phreng ldan ma gnyis yod de/ de dag las gcig ni gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog
85b3('dul ba): yin la/ gcig shos ni reg bya dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes phyogs su sgra grags pa dang / dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
85b4('dul ba): btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / dbyar tshul mas las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas gcig ni reg bya dang ldan pa rnams gyi mchog tu gyur la/ gcig shos ni gzugs bzang ba rnams kyi mchog tu gyur/ bcom
85b5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas de dag nyid kyis las
85b6('dul ba): byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ me'i khams la ma yin/
85b7('dul ba): rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su
85b8('dul ba): yang / /las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brags shig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam
86a1('dul ba): pa las chung ma blangs te de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyad pas bu khye'u zhig btsas so/ /yang rtse bar byed dga' bar
86a2('dul ba): byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de dag bsring shig bskyed nas chen por gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bram ze de chung ma dang bcas te shi nas bram ze'i khye'u de pha ma dang bral bas
86a3('dul ba): dben pa la dga' bar gyur te/ des sring mo de khrid de dgon pa'i gnas su song nas 'khod de/ der de dag rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag gis 'tsho bar brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
86a4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sbrul nag po la ni nyes dmigs rnam pa lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'khu ba dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / dug rno ba'o/ /de bzhin du bud med kha
86a5('dul ba): cig la yang nyes dmigs rnam pa lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'khu ba dang / byas pa mi gzo ba dang / dug rno ba'o/ /dge slong dag de la bud med kyi dug rno ba ni 'di yin te/ 'di
86a6('dul ba): ltar bud med ni phal cher 'dod chags lhag par che ba'o/ /de'i sring mo de nyon mongs pa dag gis gdungs nas/ des smras pa/ ming po bdag dgon pa'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bus 'tsho
86a7('dul ba): ba'i rngo mi thog gis grong mthar bzhud do/ /des de khrid de grong mthar song ste/ de bram ze zhig gi der slongs mo la zhugs so/ /des sring mo dang lhan cig slongs mo'i phyir cig car sgra phyung ba bram ze des thos te
86a8('dul ba): phyir byung nas smras pa/ drang srong dag kyang chung ma dang bcas te rgyu 'am/ des smras pa/ 'di bdag gi chung ma ma yin gyi sring mo'o/ /'di su la byin/ su la yang ma byin no/ /gal te de lta na kho bo la ci'i phyir mi byin/ 'di ni dam
86b1('dul ba): pa ma yin pa sdig pa'i chos de spangs pa yin no/ /de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis gdungs pas smras pa/ ming po ci bdag dgon pa'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bus 'tsho bar rngo mi thog pa mad
86b2('dul ba): snyam 'am/ bdag gis ni nyon mongs pa spang rngo ma thog pa'i slad du khyod la de skad bgyis kyis/ bdag bram ze 'di la stsol cig /des smras pa/ de ni chos dang 'gal bas ngas khyod sbyin par mi bya'i khyod nyid shes par
86b3('dul ba): zad do/ /bram ze des de dang de'i bsam pa shes nas 'byor ba'i dpal chen pos de bag mar blangs te/ rang gi khyim du bcug go/ /de nas des ming po de la smras pa/ ming po tshur spyon khyod kyis khab dbub par mdzod cig
86b4('dul ba): dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /des smras pa/ sring mo/ kho bo ni 'dod pa don du mi gnyer te/ khyod kyis gnang na rab tu 'byung ngo / /des smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te khyod skabs skabs su bdag gzigs shing byon
